front.title: •Battle Order & •First Strike
front.gametext: Deploy on table. You may initiate battles for free. During a battle you initiate, each time opponent plays an interrupt, opponent must first use 1 Force. For either player to initiate a Force drain, that player must first use 3 Force unless Battle Plan on table, or that player occupies a battleground system and a battleground site. (Immune to Alter.)

front.title: •Beedo
front.gametext: * Replaces any male Rodian for free (Rodian goes to the Used Pile) or deploys for 3 Force. While at Audience Chamber, all your Rodians are power +2, and whenever Greedo threatens a smuggler, may add 2 to destiny draw.
front.lore: Rodian bounty hunter. Relative of Greedo. Taking Greedo's place in Jabba's court. Fearful of Jabba's wraith. Notorious sycophant.

front.title: •Begin Landing Your Troops
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Your unique (•) Republic characters are forfeit +2 and immune to Goo Nee Tay. Unless Imperial Arrest Order on table, once during your deploy phase, may deploy one docking bay from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Once begun, the occupation of Naboo was swift, and devastatingly effective.

front.title: •Begin Landing Your Troops & The Dark Path
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Your [Seperatists icon] droids are power +1 and may shuttle from battleground systems for free. During battle may place this effect out of play to cancel and redraw your just-drawn destiny. Once per turn, each player may ignore any deployment cost on [Virtual Block 4] Watch Your Step and once per game, while that Objective on table, you may take a starfighter into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle (or draw two cards from your Reserve Deck). Jedi Tests may not modify your battle or weapon destiny draws. Lost if your [Virtual Block 4] objective on table. (Immune to Alter.)

front.title: •Ben Quadinaros' Podracer
front.gametext: Deploy on Podrace Arena. Adds 1 to each of your race destinies here. Once during each of your control phases may lose 2 Force to exchange the topmost race destiny here with topmost race destiny of another Podracer.
front.lore: Balta-Trabaat BT310 Podracer that utilizes four engines instead of two. Has the potential to be the fastest Podracer on the track, despite its inconsistent performance.

front.title: Besieged
front.gametext: Deploy on a captured starship. Your characters present with captured starship may battle opponent's characters aboard it (as if present together at a site). Effect canceled if starship escapes or is stolen.
front.lore: Stormtroopers blasted through the main airlock of the Tantive IV. The Rebel soldiers' attempt to defend the intrusion was no match for the Empire's superior firepower.

front.title: Besieged (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. If opponent just forfeited a character or unpiloted starship at same system or sector as your Imperial capital starship, you may draw destiny. Character or starship is captured if destiny > its destiny number. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Stormtroopers blasted through the main airlock of the Tantive IV. The Rebel soldiers' attempt to defend the intrusion was no match for the Empire's superior firepower.

front.title: •Bespin
front.gametext: Dark:  If you control, opponent's characters and vehicles deploy +1 to Cloud City locations.  Light:  If you control, your characters and vehicles deploy -1 to Cloud City locations.

front.title: •Bespin (V)
front.gametext: Dark:  Once per game, may deploy it here from reserve deck; reshuffle. While I'm Sorry on table (and A Sith's Plans is not), Executor is deploy = 8.  Light:  May not be converted. Immune to Revolution. If you control, your characters deploy -1 to related locations.

front.title: Bespin Motors Void Spider THX 1138
front.gametext: May add 3 passengers.  Permanent pilot provides ability of 1. May move as a 'react.'  *Landspeed = 3.  OR  Up to 3 characters may shuttle to or from same site for free.
front.lore: This light, enclosed shuttle is used for courier runs to large orbiting transports.

front.title: •Bespin: Cloud City
front.gametext: Dark:  If you control, for each of your starships or vehicles here, your total power is +1 in battles at Cloud City sites.  Light:  If you control, for each of your starships or vehicles here, your total power is +1 in battles at Cloud City sites.

combo: Bespin: Cloud City + Tibanna Gas Miner at related site Adds one to the Force drain here.

front.title: •Bib Fortuna
front.gametext: Deploys only on Tatooine. Opponent's characters of ability < 4 may not move from same site as Bib to a Jabba's Palace site. When at a Jabba's Palace site, each of you Gamorreans and Niktos may deploy as a 'react' to any Jabba's Palace site.
front.lore: Twi'lek leader and majordomo of Jabba's palace. Succeeded Jabba's last majordomo, Naroon Cuthus. Plotting to kill Jabba.

front.title: •Bib Fortuna
front.gametext: While with Jabba, power +3 and, during your draw phase, may use 1 Force to count the number of cards in your Force Pile, place your Force Pile in your Used Pile, and then activate Force up to the counted number.
front.lore: Twi'lek who serves as Jabba's major-domo. First to discover the profitability of ryll spice found on Ryloth.

front.title: •Bib Fortuna (V)
front.gametext: Opponent's non-Jedi characters are deploy +1 to [Jabba's Palace] sites. Once during your control phase, you may place three cards from hand in Used Pile to reveal top card of Reserve Deck; if it is an alien, take it into hand.
front.lore: Twi'lek leader and majordomo of Jabba's palace. Succeeded Jabba's last majordomo, Naroon Cuthus. Plotting to kill Jabba.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Steven Lewis - Yavin 4 Regionals 2006)

front.title: <>Big One
front.gametext: Dark:  'Asteroid Rules' in effect here. If you control, Force drain +1 here for each Asteroid Field at same system.  Light:  'Asteroid Rules' in effect here.

front.title: <>Big One: Asteroid Cave Or Space Slug Belly
front.gametext: Dark:  'Cave Rules' in effect here. If you control, may cancel Force drains at system related to Big One.  Light:  'Cave Rules' in effect here.

cards.counterpart: Big One: Asteroid Cave or Space Slug Belly

front.title: •Biker Scout Gear
front.gametext: Deploy on your side of table. Biker scouts have armor = 3 and are immune to Scramble. Also, Scout Blaster, Comlink, DH-17 blaster and Blaster Rack deploy for free and are destiny +2 when drawn for weapon or battle destiny (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Standard-issue equipment for Imperial biker scouts. Adds electromagnetic vision enhancement visor and boosted comlink. Protects with lightweight head and upper body armor.

pulledBy: You Cannot Hide Forever & Mobilization Points
combo: Biker Scout Gear + Imperial Blaster

front.title: Biker Scout Trooper
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of any speeder bike he pilots. Power -1 while not at a forest, jungle or Endor site. Forfeit +2 aboard a speeder bike. Once during each of your deploy phases, may deploy a speeder bike to same site from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Scout troopers, or 'biker scouts' as they are commonly called, are stormtrooper specialists. Given wide latitude to operate independently of Imperial control.

front.title: •Binder
front.gametext: May add 6 pilots or passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Your starships may move to here as a 'react.' For opponent to move a starship from here requires +1 Force. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Blank.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Casper Jorgensen and Kristian Lund)
combo: Binder + Something Special Planned For Them

front.title: Binders
front.gametext: Deploy on one of your warriors or bounty hunters. May now escort any number of captives. If device removed from your character, select one captive escorted by that character to remain and release all others.
front.lore: Because standard binders are durable but not easily adaptable, bounty hunters often carry special binders which automatically tighten around a captive's appendages.

combo: Binders + Levitation Attack

front.title: •Black 1
front.gametext: May add Juno Eclipse as pilot. TIEs are immune to Don't Get Cocky. Once per turn, may use 1 Force to take a Black Squadron TIE into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise. Immune to attrition < 5.
front.lore: TIE advanced x1 fighter boasting improved power plant, stronger shields, armored hull and enhanced weapons. Deployed to elite Imperial Navy pilots.

front.title: •Black 11
front.gametext: Deploy -1 to any mobile system. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. When with Vader in battle, may draw destiny and subtract that amount from opponent's total power.
front.lore: Stationed aboard command ship Executor. Pilot known as 'Wampa' for icy precision in battle. Often serves as escort to Lord Vader's shuttle.

front.title: •Black 2
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot.
front.lore: TIE/ln assigned to pilot DS-61-2. Has 27 'flames' on cockpit, one for each Rebel kill. Control yoke has a holo of Mithels' young son, Rejili.

pulledBy: Short Range Fighters & Watch Your Back!

front.title: •Black 2 (V)
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot. During your deploy phase, may take one Pride Of The Empire into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. All Wings Report In and Organized Attack are canceled. While DS-61-2 piloting, immune to attrition < 5.
front.lore: TIE/ln assigned to pilot DS-61-2. Has 27 'flames' on cockpit, one for each Rebel kill. Control yoke has a holo of Mithels' young son, Rejili.

front.title: •Black 2 (V)
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot. During your deploy phase, may take one Pride Of The Empire into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. During battle, All Wings Report In and Organized Attack are canceled. While DS-61-2 piloting, immune to attrition < 5.
front.lore: TIE/ln assigned to pilot DS-61-2. Has 27 'flames' on cockpit, one for each Rebel kill. Control yoke has a holo of Mithels' young son, Rejili.

pulledBy: Short Range Fighters & Watch Your Back!
cancels: All Wings Report In & Darklighter Spin

front.title: •Black 3
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot.
front.lore: TIE/ln fighter of pilot DS-61-3. Stylized image of Corellian slice-hound painted on inner hatch.

pulledBy: Short Range Fighters & Watch Your Back!

front.title: •Black 3 (V)
front.gametext: Heroic. May add 1 pilot. When this starship is targeted by Tallon Roll, 'Rebel' in its game text may be treated as '[Independent Starship]' or '[Republic]'. While DS-61-3 piloting, immune to attrition < 5.
front.lore: TIE/ln fighter of pilot DS-61-3. Stylized image of Corellian slice-hound painted on inner hatch.

front.title: •Black 3 (V)
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot. While with a Black Squadron TIE, Force drain +1 here. While DS-61-3 piloting, immune to attrition < 4 and during battle, players draw destiny from the bottom of their Reserve Deck.
front.lore: TIE/ln fighter of pilot DS-61-3. Stylized image of Corellian slice-hound painted on inner hatch.

front.title: •Black 4
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot. May deploy with a pilot as a 'react' to a battle where you have a TIE (for free if TIE is Black 2 or 3).
front.lore: TIE fighter flown by DS-61-4 at the Battle of Yavin. Scored a hit on Red 5 during the confrontation.

pulledBy: Short Range Fighters & Watch Your Back!

front.title: •Black 5
front.gametext: May add DS-61-5 as pilot.  During battle, if about to be lost before the damage segment, is instead 'hit.'  If targeted by Watch Your Back!, it is a Used Interrupt.  Immune to Don't Get Cocky and attrition < 4.

front.title: •Black 5
front.gametext: May add DS-61-5 as pilot.  During battle, if about to be lost before the damage segment, is instead 'hit.' If targeted by Watch Your Back!, it is a Used Interrupt.  Immune to Don't Get Cocky and attrition < 4.

pulledBy: Short Range Fighters & Watch Your Back!

front.title: •Black 6
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot. While Tanbris piloting, power +1. Once per game, may retrieve bottom card of Lost Pile. Your total battle destiny here is +X, where X = this TIE's power - 5.
front.lore: Blank.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Jan Westergard)

front.title: •••Black Squadron TIE
front.gametext: Deploy -2 to Death Star or same location as Vader. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 2 and adds 2 to power. Adds 1 to its weapon destiny draws.
front.lore: Part of Vader's hand-picked squadron stationed at the Death Star. Boasts the latest in Imperial weaponry. Each pilot and starfighter is at the peak of readiness.

front.title: •Black Sun Fleet
front.gametext: Any [Independent] starship with an alien pilot character aboard is immune to attrition < 4. At any site related to a system you occupy, your Black Sun agents are also information brokers. Information Exchange is immune to Alter. You may not retrieve Force for initiating a battle. During your control Phase, one of your [Independent] starships may make a regular move.

front.title: •Blast Door Controls
front.gametext: Deploy on your side of table. Cancels: Into The Garbage Chute, Flyboy; Narrow Escape; Blast The Door, Kid!; and Rebel Barrier.
front.lore: Panels control blast doors and key security lock-downs during alerts. Luke destroyed one, locking Imperial forces out of Hangar Bay 327.

front.title: •Blast Points
front.gametext: If your trooper just fired a character weapon during a battle, add one battle destiny. OR During your deploy phase, deploy on your trooper one character weapon from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: 'Only Imperial stormtroopers are so precise.'

pulls: One character weapon to deploy on a trooper

front.title: •Blasted Droid
front.gametext: During your control phase, fire (for free) one of your blasters carried by a trooper or one of your automated weapons. Any hit targets are immediately lost.
front.lore: 'Oh my! Oh, uh, I'm, I'm terribly sorry. I. . . I didn't mean to intrude. No, no, no, please don't get up. No!'

front.title: Blaster Rack
front.gametext: Deploy on your side of table. At any time, you may transfer one of your character weapons from any site to the Blaster Rack. During your deploy phase, weapon may be transferred to your character on table for an expenditure of Force equal to the weapon's deploy cost.
front.lore: Imperial facilities like the Death Star and garrison bases have blaster racks at key locations to equip soldiers with weapons like blaster rifles and thermal detonators.

front.title: Blaster Rack (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Once per turn, may \/ a matching weapon on your unique (•) character present at a site. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Imperial facilities like the Death Star and garrison bases have blaster racks at key locations to equip soldiers with weapons like blaster rifles and thermal detonators.

front.title: Blaster Rack (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Once per turn, may deploy a matching weapon on your unique (•) character present at a site from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Imperial facilities like the Death Star and garrison bases have blaster racks at key locations to equip soldiers with weapons like blaster rifles and thermal detonators.

pulls: A matching weapon on a unique character

front.title: Blaster Rifle
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on your warrior. May target a character, creature or vehicle using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +1 > defense value.
front.lore: Stormtrooper BlasTech E-11 blaster rifle. Can convert from a pistol to a rifle configuration by using extendable stock. Carries 100 shots. Military issue only.

combo: Blaster Rifle + Blaster Scope Target at an adjacent site.

front.title: Blaster Rifle (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on your Imperial warrior; warrior is power +1. May target a character, creature, or vehicle for free. Draw destiny; add 1 if targeting a character, 2 if a vehicle. Target hit, and may not be used to satisfy attrition, if total destiny > defense value.
front.lore: Stormtrooper BlasTech E-11 blaster rifle. Can convert from a pistol to a rifle configuration by using extendable stock. Carries 100 shots. Military issue only.

front.title: Blaster Rifle (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on your Imperial warrior; warrior is power +1. May target a character, creature, or vehicle for free. Draw destiny; add 1 if targeting a character, 2 if a vehicle. Target hit, and may not be used to satisfy attrition, if total destiny > defense value.
front.lore: Stormtrooper BlasTech E-11 blaster rifle. Can convert from a pistol to a rifle configuration by using extendable stock. Carries 100 shots. Military issue only.

combo: Blaster Rifle + Blaster Scope Target at an adjacent site.

front.title: Blaster Scope
front.gametext: Deploy on your non-[Permanent Weapon] blaster. Scope allows that weapon to target at an adjacent site.
front.lore: The effectiveness of a blaster can sometimes be enhanced through an electronic targeting scope mounted on top, especially for long range targets.

combo: Blaster Scope + any blaster Target at an adjacent site.

front.title: •Blizzard 1
front.gametext: May add 2 pilots and 8 passengers. Immune to attrition < 4. When using AT-AT cannon to Target The Main Generator, adds 1 to total. Landspeed may not be increased.
front.lore: General Veers' AT-AT. Enclosed. Equipped with highly sophisticated communications gear. Employs an experimental targeting system.

combo: Blizzard 1 (piloted) + Trample

front.title: •Blizzard 1 (V)
front.gametext: May add 2 pilots and 8 passengers. During the power segment of a battle here, may lose X cards from hand to cause +X attrition against opponent. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: General Veers' AT-AT. Enclosed. Equipped with highly sophisticated communications gear. Employs an experimental targeting system.

front.title: •Blizzard 2
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot and 8 passengers. Immune to attrition < 4. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 2. Landspeed may not be increased.
front.lore: AT-AT commanded by the treacherous General Nevar before he was assassinated. Fortified with an extra layer of armor by the paranoid general. Enclosed.

combo: Blizzard 2 + Trample

front.title: •Blizzard 2 (V)
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot and 8 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. During your control phase, may take one Trample or Walker Barrage into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Walker Barrage total is +2. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: AT-AT commanded by the treacherous General Nevar before he was assassinated. Fortified with an extra layer of armor by the paranoid general. Enclosed.

front.title: •Blizzard 2 (V)
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot and 8 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. During your control phase, may take one Trample or Walker Barrage into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Walker Barrage total is +2. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: AT-AT commanded by the treacherous General Nevar before he was assassinated. Fortified with an extra layer of armor by the paranoid general. Enclosed.

combo: Blizzard 2 (V) + Trample

front.title: •Blizzard 4
front.gametext: May add 6 passengers. Permanent pilots provide ability of 4. When deployed, you may deploy (for free) an Imperial warrior aboard from your Reserve Deck; reshuffle. End of your turn: Use 1 Force to maintain OR Place out of play.
front.lore: Staffed by an experienced crew. Blizzard 4's role in all engagements is to seek out new terrain uncovered by the initial offense thrust and unload troops to hold it. Enclosed.

combo: Blizzard 4 + Trample

front.title: •Blizzard 4 (V)
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot and 6 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. When deployed, may deploy a non-pilot Imperial warrior aboard (for free). Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Staffed by an experienced crew. Blizzard 4's role in all engagements is to seek out new terrain uncovered by the initial offense thrust and unload troops to hold it. Enclosed.

front.title: •Blizzard Scout 1
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot or passenger. May move as a 'react.' Power +1 at any Hoth site. Permanent pilot provides ability of 1.
front.lore: Enclosed All Terrain Scout Transport (AT-ST). Provides flanking support to the AT-ATs of Blizzard Force. Modified for cold weather combat.

combo: Blizzard Scout 1 + Admiral Motti + Snowtroopers (at other locations).
Blizzard Scout 1 + Trample Trample opponent's undercover spies.

front.title: •Blizzard Scout 1 (V)
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot or passenger. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. May move as a 'react.' During battle, if with your piloted AT-AT, may cancel game text of an opponent's character present.
front.lore: Enclosed All Terrain Scout Transport (AT-ST). Provides flanking support to the AT-ATs of Blizzard Force. Modified for cold weather combat.

front.title: •Blizzard Scout 1 (V)
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot or passenger. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. May move as a 'react.' During battle, if with your piloted AT-AT, may cancel game text of an opponent's character present.
front.lore: Enclosed All Terrain Scout Transport (AT-ST). Provides flanking support to the AT-ATs of Blizzard Force. Modified for cold weather combat.

combo: Blizzard Scout 1 (V) + Trample

front.title: •••Blizzard Walker
front.gametext: May add 2 pilots and 8 passengers. Immune to attrition < 4. Landspeed may not be increased.
front.lore: Enclosed All Terrain Armored Transport. Commonly called an Imperial walker. One of the most terrifying and deadly weapons in the Empire's arsenal. 15.5 meters tall.

combo: Blizzard Walker (piloted) + Trample

front.title: •Blockade Flagship
front.gametext: May add 4 pilots, 4 passengers, 2 vehicles and 4 droid starfighters. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Once per game, may deploy a Neimoidian pilot aboard from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Aware that the Senate was sending a commission to Naboo, the Trade Federation evacuated many of its battleships, leaving its flagship to operate as the Droid Control Ship.

combo: Blockade Flagship + Sil Unch

front.title: •Blockade Flagship (V)
front.gametext: May add 4 pilots, 4 passengers, 2 vehicles and 4 droid starfighters. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Once per game, may deploy a Neimoidian pilot aboard. Immune to Medium Transport.
front.lore: Aware that the Senate was sending a commission to Naboo, the Trade Federation evacuated many of its battleships, leaving its flagship to operate as the Droid Control Ship.

front.title: •Blockade Flagship: Bridge
front.gametext: Dark:  While you control with Haako, Gunray, or Dofine, your [Presence] droids are power +1.  Light:  Unless your Jedi here, Force drain -1 here.

combo: Blockade Flagship: Bridge + Nute Gunray Battle Droids and Destroyer Droids are power +1, Destroyer Droids are destiny +3 if drawn for battle destiny, and Nute Gunray prevents opponent's Jedi to move or deploy at Blockade Flagship: Bridge.

front.title: •Blockade Flagship: Docking Bay
front.gametext: Dark:  Your Docking Bay transit from here is free.  Light:  Your Docking Bay transit to and from here requires +8 Force.

front.title: •Blockade Flagship: Hallway
front.gametext: Dark:  If you occupy, Force generation +1 here, and opponent's characters may not move from here.  Light:  Your Jedi deploy +2 here.

front.title: •Blockade Support Ship
front.gametext: Unless Fondor on table, may deploy -3 as a 'react.' May add 3 pilots and 4 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2.
front.lore: These heavily modifed battleships are used to control and direct the Trade Federation's automated army. Easily identified by its array of sensors and antennae.

front.title: •Blockade Support Ship
front.gametext: Unless Fondor on table, may deploy -3 as a 'react.' May add 3 pilots and 4 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2.
front.lore: These heavily modifed battleships are used to control and direct the Trade Federation's automated army. Easily identified by its array of sensors and antennae.

front.title: •Blow Parried
front.gametext: Take top card of Force Pile into hand. OR If opponent just revealed a combat card, it is canceled (place in opponent's Used Pile) and opponent must draw destiny instead (that destiny is reduced by 1). OR Cancel Glancing Blow, Clash Of Sabers, or Obi-Wan's Journal.
front.lore: Offense may win battles, but defense keeps you alive long enough to mount an offense.

front.title: •Blown Clear
front.gametext: Deploy on your side of table. During a battle, you may place out of playfrom hand a copy of any unique (•) card participating in that battle to reduce attrition against you by that card's forfeit value. (Immune to Alter while you occupy a battleground.)
front.lore: Vader was nearly killed when Han damaged his TIE fighter during a surprise attack in the Death Star trench.

front.title: •Blown Clear (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. May place an Imperial Council Member here from hand. Once per turn, if an admiral or logistics agenda here, may subtract X from a starship's forfeit and immunity to attrition for remainder of turn, where X = total influence at Conference Room.
front.lore: Vader was nearly killed when Han damaged his TIE fighter during a surprise attack in the Death Star trench.

front.title: •Boba Fett
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. When piloting Slave I, also adds 2 to maneuver and may draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise. When escorting a captive, captive is forfeit +5. May 'fly' (landspeed = 3). Immune to attrition < 3.
front.lore: Feared bounty hunter. Collected bounties on Solo from both the Empire and Jabba the Hutt. Took exquisite pleasure in using Solo's friend to capture him.

combo: Boba Fett + Lyn Me Free deployment of Boba Fett at her site.
Boba Fett + Res Luk Ra'auf Add two battle destinies if Boba Fett is defending a battle alone.
Boba Fett (CC) + Bounty

front.title: •Boba Fett
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power and 1 to maneuver of anything he pilots. May deploy -1 as a 'react' to same site as a gangster or smuggler. When firing weapons, any 'hit' characters are forfeit = 0. May 'fly' (landspeed = 3). Immune to attrition < 3.
front.lore: Infamous bounty hunter. Hired to help Jabba intimidate debtors and smugglers. Crack shot. Mandalorian armor and jet pack provide protection and flight capability.

combo: Boba Fett + Lyn Me Free deployment of Boba Fett at her site.
Boba Fett + Res Luk Ra'auf Add two battle destinies if Boba Fett is defending a battle alone.

front.title: •Boba Fett (V)
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  May 'fly' (landspeed = 3).  Permanent weapon is Projectile Grappling Hook (may target a character for free; draw destiny; target captured if destiny +1 > defense value).  Immune to attrition < 3 (< 5 while with Jabba).
front.lore: Infamous bounty hunter. Hired to help Jabba intimidate debtors and smugglers. Crack shot. Mandalorian armor and jet pack provide protection and flight capability.

front.title: •Boba Fett (V)
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  May 'fly' (landspeed = 3).  Draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise.  Your cards with 'Bounty' in title are immune to Aim High.  During your control phase, may take a card with 'Bounty' in title into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Feared bounty hunter. Collected bounties on Solo from both the Empire and Jabba the Hutt. Took exquisite pleasure in using Solo's friend to capture him.

front.title: •Boba Fett (V)
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. Deploys -1 aboard Slave I. Adds one battle destiny with Vader (or while piloting Slave I). Once per game, if a battle was just initiated here, may exchange a card in hand with a card in Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Feared bounty hunter. Collected bounties on Solo from both the Empire and Jabba the Hutt. Took exquisite pleasure in using Solo's friend to capture him.

front.title: •Boba Fett In Slave I
front.gametext: May add 3 passengers. Permanent pilot is •Boba Fett, who provides ability of 3, adds 3 to power, adds 2 to maneuver and draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise. Immune to attrition < 5.
front.lore: Dangerous and deadly starfighter piloted by its notorious owner. Uses combat-grade shields and sensors. Hidden weapons provide lethal surprises for Fett's victims.

combo: Boba Fett In Slave I + Res Luk Ra'auf Add two battle destinies if Boba Fett is defending a battle alone.

front.title: •Boba Fett In Slave I (V)
front.gametext: Permanent pilot is •Boba Fett, who provides ability of 3.  Draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.  Slave I's power may not be reduced by opponent.  Immune to Eject! Eject! and attrition < 5.
front.lore: Dangerous and deadly starfighter piloted by its notorious owner. Uses combat-grade shields and sensors. Hidden weapons provide lethal surprises for Fett's victims.

front.title: •Boba Fett In Slave I (V)
front.gametext: Permanent pilot is •Boba Fett, who provides ability of 3.  Draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.  Slave I's power may not be reduced by opponent.  Immune to Eject! Eject! and attrition < 5.
front.lore: Dangerous and deadly starfighter piloted by its notorious owner. Uses combat-grade shields and sensors. Hidden weapons provide lethal surprises for Fett's victims.

combo: Boba Fett In Slave I + Res Luk Ra'auf Add two battle destinies if Boba Fett is defending a battle alone.

front.title: •Boba Fett With Blaster Rifle
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. Adds one battle destiny if with Han or Jabba. Permanent weapon is •Boba Fett's Blaster Rifle (may target a character or creature for free; draw destiny; target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if destiny +1 > defense value).
front.lore: Notorious bounty hunter. 'As you wish.'

combo: Boba Fett + Lyn Me Free deployment of Boba Fett at her site.
cancels: Mace Windu (V) prevents Fetts from adding battle destiny draws at same location

front.title: •Boba Fett, Bounty Hunter
front.gametext: Text: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. Adds one battle destiny if with your alien or Imperial (or adds two battle destiny if with your bounty hunter or Vader). Immune to attrition < 5. End of your turn: Use 2 Force to maintain OR Lose 2 Force to place in Used Pile OR Place out of play.
front.lore: The most feared bounty hunter in the galaxy. Justifiably, his fee is as large as his reputation.

combo: Boba Fett + Lyn Me Free deployment of Boba Fett at her site.
Boba Fett + Res Luk Ra'auf Add two battle destinies if Boba Fett is defending a battle alone.
Boba Fett, Bounty Hunter + any bounty hunter or any Vader Adds two battle destinies.
Boba Fett, Bounty Hunter + Zuckuss In Mist Hunter + 4-LOM With Concussion Rifle Four battle destinies.
cancels: Mace Windu (V) prevents Fetts from adding battle destiny draws at same location

front.title: •Boba Fett, Bounty Hunter (V)
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  May 'fly' (landspeed = 3).  Adds one battle destiny if with your alien or Imperial. Immune to attrition < 3 (< 5 if with Vader or a bounty hunter).
front.lore: The most feared bounty hunter in the galaxy. Justifiably, his fee is as large as his reputation.

front.title: •Boba Fett, Prepared Hunter
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. May be revealed from hand to take Slave I from Reserve Deck; reshuffle;  and deploy both simultaneously. While piloting Slave I, it is maneuver +3 and hyperspeed + 1. Draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise (if present at a site may add a destiny to total power instead).
front.lore: Bounty hunter. Assassin. Boba Fett's Mandalorian armor was so versatile that his opponents never knew what to expect.

front.title: •Boba Fett, Relentless Bounty Hunter
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  May 'fly' (landspeed = 3).  While armed with a blaster, may add one destiny to total power or attrition.  During your move phase, if escorting a captive, may use 2 Force to relocate both to a docking bay.  Immune to attrition < 3.
front.lore: Boba Fett's helmet has infrared capabilities, a motion tracking system, a macrobinocular viewer, an internal comlink and a broadband antenna. He doesn't miss a thing.

front.title: •Boba Fett's Blaster Rifle
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on Boba Fett, or 3 on your other bounty hunter. May deploy as a 'react.' May target a character, creature or vehicle using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Add 1 if targeting a vehicle. Target hit if total destiny > defense value. May fire repeatedly for 1 Force each time.
front.lore: Sawed off BlasTech EE-3 blaster rifle. Although its barrel is a few centimeters under the legal limit, no one has lived to file an official complaint.

canceledBy: Game text canceled by Mandalorian Mishap

front.title: •Boba Fett's Blaster Rifle (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on non-[Maintenance] Boba Fett. During your turn, opponent's characters here may not use landspeed. While a captive at same site, your Force drains are +1 here. May target a character for free. Draw destiny. Target captured if destiny +2 > defense value.
front.lore: Sawed off BlasTech EE-3 blaster rifle. Although its barrel is a few centimeters under the legal limit, no one has lived to file an official complaint.

front.title: •Boba Fett's Blaster Rifle (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on your non-[maintenance] bounty hunter. If on Boba Fett, once per game, during your move phase, may use 2 Force to relocate him (with any captive he is escorting) to a [Jabba's Palace] site. May target a character or vehicle for free. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +2 > defense value.
front.lore: Sawed off BlasTech EE-3 blaster rifle. Although its barrel is a few centimeters under the legal limit, no one has lived to file an official complaint.

canceledBy: Game text canceled by Mandalorian Mishap

front.title: •Boelo
front.gametext: Deploys only on Tatooine or to same site as Jabba. When in a battle either at Audience Chamber or with your alien leader, may cancel one opponent's battle destiny just drawn.
front.lore: Naroon Cuthus' predecessor as Jabba's right hand man. Sees what he wants to see. Hears what he wants to hear. Has a pet womp rat named Worra.

combo: Boelo + any Jabba All Jabba personas are leaders.

front.title: Bog-wing
front.gametext: * Ferocity = destiny -1. Habitat: Dagobah. Parasite: Character (that can move). Relocate Bog-wing and host up to two sites away (opponent of victim chooses). Bog-wing then detaches.
front.lore: Avian jungle-dweller. Fiercely territorial. Uses powerful talons to pick up and bear off victims. Carries up to nine times it's own body weight. Feeds primarily on root lizards and vine snakes.

front.title: •Bok Askol
front.gametext: Once during your deploy phase, may draw destiny: (0-2) no result; (3-4) Askol draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise for remainder of turn; (5+) Askol is power +4 for remainder of turn.
front.lore: At birth, a Pacithhips gene configuration usually indicates if they're to become a farmer, an intellectual, or a warrior. Bok Askol's destiny remained a mystery for years.

front.title: <>Bombing Run
front.gametext: Deploy on a non-interior planet site (except Dagobah). May move to an adjacent non-interior site at start of your move phase. Your bombers at a related system you control may move to this site. Bombers must return to system at end of your battle phase (if possible).
front.lore: Bombers can sometimes slip past orbital defenses. Making a lowaltitude bombing run allows 'surgical strikes,' even in cramped situations such as canyons and city streets.

front.title: Boonta Eve Podrace
front.gametext: Deploy on Podrace Arena. Once per game, either player may initiate a Podrace: During your control phase, each player may draw one race destiny. Each player may place any drawn race destiny on their Podracer (or on Podrace Arena if they have none) or in their Used Pile. During any move phase, winner is any player with a race total > 24 and greater than opponent's highest race total. Winner retrieves 6 Force and loser loses 6 Force. Place all race destiny cards in owner's Used Piles and all Podracers are lost.

front.title: Boosted TIE Cannon
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on your TIE Advanced x1. May target a starship using 1 Force. Draw destiny. Subtract 1 if targeting a capital starship. Add 1 if targeting a starfighter. Target hit if total destiny > defense value.
front.lore: Enhanced TIE blaster cannon prototype. Greater range and power. Improved targeting software. Requires more powerful energy cells. Tested by elite TIE squadrons.

front.title: Boring Conversation Anyway
front.gametext: Cancel either: Report To Lord Vader, Scomp Link Access, Rebel Planners, Rebel Reinforcements, Gift of the Mentor, Panic, Don't Get Cocky, Skywalkers, Demotion, Combined Attack or Surprise Assault.
front.lore: 'Uh...had a slight weapons malfunction. But, uh, everything's perfectly all right now. We're fine. We're all fine here, now, thank you. How are you?'

front.title: •Bossk
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. When piloting Hound's Tooth, draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise. Adds 1 to attrition against opponent in battles at same site. While present, may reduce Chewie's forfeit to zero while here.
front.lore: Male Trandoshan bounty hunter. Strong but clumsy. Extremely proud and arrogant. Suffered a humiliating defeat at the hands of Chewbacca and his partner Han Solo.

combo: Bossk + Luke? Luuuuke! + any Chewbacca Makes Chewbacca Lost. (Indiana Jones Jedi Knight)

front.title: •Bossk (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. While at same site as a smuggler, power +3. While with opponent's smuggler or Wookiee, opponent may not draw more than one battle destiny here. Immune to attrition < number of opponent's smugglers on table.
front.lore: Male Trandoshan bounty hunter. Strong but clumsy. Extremely proud and arrogant. Suffered a humiliating defeat at the hands of Chewbacca and his partner Han Solo.

front.title: •Bossk (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. While at same site as a smuggler, power +3. While with opponent's smuggler or Wookiee, opponent may not draw more than one battle destiny here. Immune to attrition < number of opponent's smugglers on table.
front.lore: Male Trandoshan bounty hunter. Strong but clumsy. Extremely proud and arrogant. Suffered a humiliating defeat at the hands of Chewbacca and his partner Han Solo.

front.title: •Bossk In Hound's Tooth
front.gametext: May add 6 passengers and 1 vehicle. Permanent pilot is •Bossk, who provides ability of 2, adds 2 to power and adds one battle destiny. Deploys and moves like a starfighter. Has ship-docking capability.
front.lore: Bossk once said of his ship, 'Greeezeg out nikek!'

front.title: •Bossk In Hound's Tooth (V)
front.gametext: Permanent pilot is •Bossk, who provides ability of 2. During battle with opponent's [Independent] starship (or Falcon), may add one destiny to total power or attrition. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Bossk once said of his ship, 'Greeezeg out nikek!'

front.title: •Bossk In Hound's Tooth (V)
front.gametext: Permanent pilot is •Bossk, who provides ability of 2.  During battle with opponent's [Independent] starship (or Falcon), may add one destiny to total power or attrition.  Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Bossk once said of his ship, 'Greeezeg out nikek!'

front.title: •Bossk With Mortar Gun
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Permanent weapon is •Bossk's Mortar Gun (may fire for free; draw destiny; may subtract or add 1 if at same site as a bounty; choose one character with that destiny number present to be captured.)
front.lore: Trandoshan bounty hunter. Modified his mortar gun to fire stun cartridges for live captures. Uses non-fragmentary capture rounds to minimize collateral damage.

front.title: •Bossk with Mortar Gun (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. May not be targeted by weapons unless your other slavers present are each 'hit'. Permanent weapon is •Bossk's Mortar Gun (may target a character for free. Draw destiny. Target hit and forfeit =0, if destiny matches target's destiny number).
front.lore: Trandoshan Assassin and Slaver. Modified his mortar gun to fire stun cartridges for live captures. Uses non-fragmentary capture rounds to minimize collateral damage.

front.title: •Bossk's Mortar Gun
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on Bossk, 4 on any other warrior. May fire using 2 Force. Draw destiny. If destiny > 0, one card with that destiny number at same site is lost (your choice). If destiny = 0, mortar gun explodes and warrior firing it is lost.
front.lore: Relby-v10 micro grenade launcher. Modified version of the limited range CSPL 'Caspel' Projectile Launcher. Blows lots of stuff up.

front.title: Bounty
front.gametext: Deploy on an opponent's non-droid character. If subsequently captured, seized by a bounty hunter and then transferred to a prison, retrieve Force equal to character's forfeit -2 and place Effect in Used Pile. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: One of the most profitable occupations in the galaxy is hunting down and capturing wanted beings. The more notable the quarry, the more profitable the venture.

combo: Bounty + Boba Fett (CC) Add five to the number of cards retrieved.
Bounty + Corporal Vandolay Makes We Have A Prisoner a Used Interrupt, and lets you pull a prison from Reserve Deck.
Bounty + Carbon-Freezing

front.title: Bounty (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on a just captured character without a bounty. During your control phase, may transfer captive to a related prison (take this card into hand) to retrieve 4 Force. If released, place captive (and cards on them) in owner's Used Pile. Your Force drains are +1 here. (Immune to Control.)
front.lore: One of the most profitable occupations in the galaxy is hunting down and capturing wanted beings. The more notable the quarry, the more profitable the venture.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Steven Lewis - Tennessee States 2006)

front.title: •Bow To The First Order
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Once per game, may take Finalizer into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Once per character, when you deploy Hux, Kylo, Phasma, or Snoke to a battleground, may take any one card from Used Pile into hand; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Blank.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Justin Desai)

front.title: •Brangus Glee
front.gametext: Power +2 at Cantina. Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Once per turn, may exchange a docking bay from hand with top card of Lost Pile. Your docking bay transit is free when moving to or from same site. Immune to attrition < 3.
front.lore: Elder of a dextrous race of renowned travelers. Gambler. Frequents casinos, bars and spaceports. Originally from distant planet Dor Nameth

front.title: •Brangus Glee (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots.  Deploys -1 and forfeit +1 at a docking bay or aboard a starship.  During your control phase, if at a battleground, may use 1 force (free if at Casino) to exchange a card in hand with a random card in Lost Pile.  Immune to attrition < 3.
front.lore: Elder of a dextrous race of renowned travelers. Gambler. Frequents casinos, bars and spaceports. Originally from distant planet Dor Nameth

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Bill Kafer - League Cube Tournament 2009)

front.title: •Breached Defenses
front.gametext: If an Imperial just moved to an Echo site, deploy on your side of table. While you have presence at an Echo site, your total power is +1 in battles at Hoth sites.
front.lore: 'Imperial troops have entered the base! Imperial troops have entered-'

front.title: •Breached Defenses & •Molator
front.gametext: Deploy on table.  Once per game, unless [Virtual] Crossfire on table (or out of play), may use 3 Force to take an Effect that deploys on a location (except Expand the Empire) into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  If your character or non-[Independent Starship] starship in battle is about to be lost before the damage segment, it is instead lost at the end of battle (if forfeited, forfeit for 0).  Your non-Dark Jedi characters without [Permanent Weapon] or [Maintenance] are immune to Goo Nee Tay.  May not be canceled. (Immune to Alter.)

front.title: •Brief Loss Of Control
front.gametext: Just after the weapons phase of a battle, use 2 Force to cause each player to target one of that player's characters involved in the battle. Target characters cannot apply their ability toward drawing battle destiny this turn.
front.lore: Eliciting fear from the opponent gives the dark side a powerful advantage.

front.title: •Brief Loss Of Control (V)
front.gametext: USED: Once per game, during opponent's activate phase, target a location. Opponent is prevented from controlling that location (and loses senate majority if targeting Galactic Senate) for remainder of turn.  LOST: Cancel Control.
front.lore: Eliciting fear from the opponent gives the dark side a powerful advantage.

front.title: Bring Him Before Me / Take Your Father's Place
front.gametext: Bring Him Before Me:Deploy Throne Room, Insignificant Rebellion and Your Destiny.{For} remainder of game, Scanning Crew may not be played. Opponent's cards that place a character out of play may not target Luke. You may deploy Emperor (deploy -2) from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Opponent may deploy Luke from Reserve Deck (deploy -2; reshuffle) or Lost Pile. If Luke is present with Vader and Vader is not escorting a captive, Luke is captured and seized by Vader. Vader may not transfer Luke.{Flip} this card if Luke captured.Take Your Father's Place:{While} this side up, lose 1 Force at end of each of your turns. Once during each of your turns, when Vader, Luke (even as a non-frozen captive) and Emperor are all present at your Throne Room, you may initiate a Luke/Vader duel: Each player draws two destiny. Add ability. Highest total wins. If Vader wins, opponent loses 3 Force. If Luke wins, shuffle Reserve Deck and draw destiny; if destiny > 12, Luke crosses to Dark Side, totally depleting opponent's Life Force.{Flip} if Luke neither present with Vader nor a captive.

back.title: Bring Him Before Me / Take Your Father's Place
back.gametext: Bring Him Before Me:Deploy Throne Room, Insignificant Rebellion and Your Destiny.{For} remainder of game, Scanning Crew may not be played. Opponent's cards that place a character out of play may not target Luke. You may deploy Emperor (deploy -2) from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Opponent may deploy Luke from Reserve Deck (deploy -2; reshuffle) or Lost Pile. If Luke is present with Vader and Vader is not escorting a captive, Luke is captured and seized by Vader. Vader may not transfer Luke.{Flip} this card if Luke captured.Take Your Father's Place:{While} this side up, lose 1 Force at end of each of your turns. Once during each of your turns, when Vader, Luke (even as a non-frozen captive) and Emperor are all present at your Throne Room, you may initiate a Luke/Vader duel: Each player draws two destiny. Add ability. Highest total wins. If Vader wins, opponent loses 3 Force. If Luke wins, shuffle Reserve Deck and draw destiny; if destiny > 12, Luke crosses to Dark Side, totally depleting opponent's Life Force.{Flip} if Luke neither present with Vader nor a captive.

front.title: •Broken Concentration
front.gametext: Deploy on your side of table. Apprentices subtract X from training destiny, where X = ability - Jedi Test number (minimum zero). Also, once per turn, you may use 2 Force to move the top card of opponent's Force Pile to the top of opponent's Reserve Deck.
front.lore: To effectively use the Force, a Jedi is required to learn concentration. A Jedi who gives in to distraction places both himself and his friends in peril.

front.title: •Broken Concentration (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table.  Cancels game text of [Reflections III] Naboo sites.  Training destiny draws are -X, where X = apprentice's ability - Jedi Test Number.  Once per game, may place this Effect out of play to reduce your battle damage by 4.  Immune to NOOOOOOOOOOOO!.  (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: To effectively use the Force, a Jedi is required to learn concentration. A Jedi who gives in to distraction places both himself and his friends in peril.

front.title: •Bubo
front.gametext: Habitat: planet sites (except Hoth). Does not attack your characters. When at a Jabba's palace site, prevents opponents characters from using their landspeed.
front.lore: Watchbeast. Unwittingly foiled Ree Yees' plot to kill Jabba with a thermal detonator when it ate a crucial component. Louder than it is tough. Keeps watch for unwary intruders.

front.title: •Cad Bane
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots.  Ponda Baba's Hold-out Blaster deploys and fires for free on Bane.  Once per turn, if Bane just used a weapon to hit a character, may 'annihilate' target (target is placed out of play when forfeited this battle).
front.lore: Bounty Hunter

front.title: •Cad Bane
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Your other bounty hunters here are power +1. Draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. During battle, if with your other bounty hunter, may cancel the immunity to attrition of a Jedi here.
front.lore: Duros bounty hunter.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Brad Eier)

front.title: Caller
front.gametext: Deploy on Imperial or Jawa. During your control phase, may steal one droid at same site if it is controlled by a Restraining Bolt. After droid is stolen, Restraining Bolt returns to owner's hand.
front.lore: Hand-held device that commands restraining bolt. Each caller can be keyed to a specific bolt. Used throughout the galaxy. Also called 'owners.'

front.title: Cane Adiss
front.gametext: If opponent just initiated a Force drain at a non-shielded planet location, deploy on that location. Your characters, vehicles and starships may deploy here regardless of presence and location deployment restrictions. (Immune to Control.)
front.lore: Adventurous pilot. Boasts to Jabba that he has traveled to every uncharted planet in the galaxy. Has been hired by the Empire to keep an eye out for Rebel activity.

front.title: <>Cane Adiss (V)
front.gametext: If opponent just Force drained at their non-battleground site (or anywhere for more than 2 Force), deploy on that location. Your characters and vehicles may deploy (for -1 Force each) here regardless of location deployment restrictions. If you control this location, place this card in Used Pile; opponent loses 2 Force. (Immune to Control.)
front.lore: Adventurous pilot. Boasts to Jabba that he has traveled to every uncharted planet in the galaxy. Has been hired by the Empire to keep an eye out for Rebel activity.

front.title: •Captain Bewil
front.gametext: During your control phase, may search your Reserve Deck, take one Laser Gate, Heart Of The Chasm or Rite Of Passage into hand and reshuffle. Opponent's characters may not move from same site as Bewil to a mobile site.
front.lore: Tactical officer from Dentaal. Leader. Familiar with utilizing computer controls to lure an invading enemy into a tactically weak position.

front.title: •Captain Bewil (V)
front.gametext: Agenda: logistics. While at Conference Room, opponent must lose 3 Force to 'react' away from a battle, and, if your total Influence here is > 3, during your turn you may take an Interrupt into hand from Force Pile; reshuffle.
front.lore: Tactical officer from Dentaal. Leader. Familiar with utilizing computer controls to lure an invading enemy into a tactically weak position.

front.title: •Captain Bewil (V)
front.gametext: While at a Cloud City site, adds one to the number of Bespin locations required to cancel Dark Deal. Once per turn, if Dark Deal on table, may search your Force Pile and take one Interrupt into hand; reshuffle.
front.lore: Tactical officer from Dentaal. Leader. Familiar with utilizing computer controls to lure an invading enemy into a tactically weak position.

front.title: •Captain Daultay Dofine
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of any capital starship he pilots. Once per game may take Activate The Droids into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. While aboard Blockade Flagship, it is immune to attrition < 5 and Activate The Droids is immune to Alter.
front.lore: Neimoidian captain of the Trade Federation Droid Control Ship blockading Naboo. Cowardly, lazy, and extremely greedy.

front.title: •Captain Gilad Pellaeon
front.gametext: Deploys for free to Thrawn's location. Each other Imperial aboard same capital starship is forfeit +2. Adds 2 to power of any capital starship he pilots (3 if Chimaera). While aboard Chimaera with Thrawn, also adds 2 to that starship's armor and hyperspeed.
front.lore: Corellian leader. Lied about his age to enter the Academy. Took command of Chimaera when its captain was killed at the Battle of Endor. Admires Grand Admiral Thrawn.

front.title: •Captain Godherdt
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of any capital starship he pilots. While aboard a Star Destroyer, adds 1 to armor, adds 1 to hyperspeed and, once during each of your move phases, may cancel Landing Claw at same system or sector.
front.lore: Elite fleet engineer. Technically brilliant. Key operator of magnetic signature sensors monitoring Star Destroyer hulls.

front.title: •Captain Jonus
front.gametext: Deploys -2 aboard Scimitar 2. Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. When forfeited from a TIE/sa, also satisfies all remaining attrition and battle damage against you.
front.lore: Often flies as top cover during bombing runs. Served with Death Squadron. Narrowly escaped death by space slug. Scored several kills against rebel blockade runners.

front.title: •Captain Jonus in Scimitar 2
front.gametext: Permanent pilot is *Jonus, who provides ability of 2. This starship's missile weapon destiny draws are +1. If at a system you control, your total power at related sistes is +1.
front.lore: TIE bomber repaired after being struck by an asteroid in the Anoat system. Stationed aboard second Death Star battle station.

front.title: •Captain Khurgee
front.gametext: Once during each of your control phases, you may use 2 Force to take one Scanning Crew into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Docking bay security officer. Leader. Honored for bravery aboard the Star Destroyer Thunderflare where he rescued five officers from the wreckage of a shuttle crash.

front.title: •Captain Khurgee (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. While at a battleground system, once during your turn may peek at top card of opponent's Reserve Deck; if it is a Rebel, may lose 1 Force to make it lost. Forfeit +2 (to a maximum of 7) aboard Thunderflare or with a leader.
front.lore: Docking bay security officer. Leader. Honored for bravery aboard the Star Destroyer Thunderflare where he rescued five officers from the wreckage of a shuttle crash.

front.title: •Captain Lennox
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots (3 if starship is Tyrant). When on a Star Destroyer, may use its tractor beam once during each of your control phases.
front.lore: Captain of the Imperial Star Destroyer Tyrant. An able leader. Unlike most Imperial officers, he is dedicated to his ship and crew. Finds political maneuvering distasteful.

combo: Captain Lennox + Tractor Beam + Besieged

front.title: •Captain Lennox (V)
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of any Star Destroyer he pilots.  Deploys free aboard Tyrant, and, while aboard, draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise and your total power here is +1 for each of opponent's starfighters here.
front.lore: Captain of the Imperial Star Destroyer Tyrant. An able leader. Unlike most Imperial officers, he is dedicated to his ship and crew. Finds political maneuvering distasteful.

front.title: •Captain Mod Terrik
front.gametext: Other sandtroopers are deploy -1. Your ability-1 troopers may not have their forfeit reduced and (unless they have another forfeit bonus) are forfeit +2. At sites where you have two troopers, they may draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.
front.lore: Leader. Captain Mod Terrik, a typical officer of the Desert Sands sandtrooper unit. Fearless and highly motivated. Willing to sacrifice as many troops as necessary.

front.title: •Captain Needa
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. When piloting Avenger, that starship is also immune to attrition < 4. You may re-target applicable Utinni Effects to Needa. If in a battle where you choose to forfeit characters, you must forfeit Needa first.
front.lore: Able leader and captain of the Avenger. Was given his command by Admiral Ozzel. Treated with suspicion by Darth Vader and the Emperor, who distrust Ozzel's close advisors.

front.title: •Captain Peavey
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. Deploys -1 to Finalizer. While piloting Finalizer, it is immune to attrition <8 (< 10 while with a Resistance character or [Resistance] starship). May be targeted by Imperial Command as an admiral (even if a unit of Force).
front.lore: Leader.

front.title: •Captain Phasma
front.gametext: Adds one battle destiny with a stormtrooper. If you just won a battle at same or related location, may retrieve a trooper.
front.lore: Female leader. Stormtrooper.

cards.conceptBy: (Image courtesy of Emi Tolibas)

front.title: •Captain Piett
front.gametext: Power +1 when at same site as Vader. Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots (3 if starship is Executor). May use 1 Force to take one Probe Droid into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Captain on the Executor. Monitored probe droid telemetry. His flawless record of arrests and suppressions has contributed to an impressive rise through the ranks.

front.title: •Captain Piett (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Twice per game during opponent's turn, may place three cards from hand on your Force Pile to draw top two cards from Reserve Deck.
front.lore: Captain on the Executor. Monitored probe droid telemetry. His flawless record of arrests and suppressions has contributed to an impressive rise through the ranks.

front.title: •Captain Sarkli
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. While he controls opponent's non-battleground location, opponent generates no Force here. While he occupies opponent's Subjugated system, Liberation is flipped and Local Uprising may not be flipped.
front.lore: Piett's nephew. Once granted audience with Emperor. On fast-track to promotion. Absolutely fearless spy.

combo: Captain Sarkli + Nevar Yalnal

front.title: •Captain Yorr
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots (3 if a starfighter). When piloting a TIE Defender and with Jendon, adds one battle destiny.
front.lore: Former member of Imperial Demonstration Team. Flew test flights during development of various TIE prototypes. Jendon's wingman. Has scored 24 combat victories.

combo: Captain Yorr in Onyx 2 + Colonel Jendon in Onyx 1

front.title: •Captain Yorr (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots (3 if piloting any starfighter). If your starship participating in a battle is about to be excluded (even if that starship may not participate in battle) or made lost by opponent, you may choose for it to be 'hit' instead.
front.lore: Former member of Imperial Demonstration Team. Flew test flights during development of various TIE prototypes. Jendon's wingman. Has scored 24 combat victories.

front.title: Carbon Chamber Testing / My Favorite Decoration
front.gametext: Carbon Chamber Testing:Deploy Carbonite Chamber, Carbonite Chamber Console and Security Tower with a Rebel (opponent's choice) from opponent's Reserve Deck (if possible) imprisoned there.{While} this side up, once during each of your deploy phases, you may deploy from Reserve Deck one Audience Chamber, Docking Bay 94 or East Platform; reshuffle. You may not play Dark Deal.{Flip} this card if you move a frozen captive to Audience Chamber (or if no Rebel was in opponent's Reserve Deck at start of game).My Favorite Decoration:{While} this side up, your aliens and starships are immune to attrition < 4 and, once during each of your control phases, you may retrieve 1 Force. While you have a frozen captive at Audience Chamber, Scum And Villainy is immune to Alter and during your deploy phase, you may deploy Scum And Villainy from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.{Place} out of play if there are no frozen captives on table (unless no Rebel was in opponent's Reserve Deck at start of game).

back.title: Carbon Chamber Testing / My Favorite Decoration
back.gametext: Carbon Chamber Testing:Deploy Carbonite Chamber, Carbonite Chamber Console and Security Tower with a Rebel (opponent's choice) from opponent's Reserve Deck (if possible) imprisoned there.{While} this side up, once during each of your deploy phases, you may deploy from Reserve Deck one Audience Chamber, Docking Bay 94 or East Platform; reshuffle. You may not play Dark Deal.{Flip} this card if you move a frozen captive to Audience Chamber (or if no Rebel was in opponent's Reserve Deck at start of game).My Favorite Decoration:{While} this side up, your aliens and starships are immune to attrition < 4 and, once during each of your control phases, you may retrieve 1 Force. While you have a frozen captive at Audience Chamber, Scum And Villainy is immune to Alter and during your deploy phase, you may deploy Scum And Villainy from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.{Place} out of play if there are no frozen captives on table (unless no Rebel was in opponent's Reserve Deck at start of game).

front.title: Carbon-Freezing
front.gametext: Deploy on Carbonite Chamber. During your control phase, may target one captive present. Draw destiny. If destiny < 5, captive lost. If destiny > 10, place on captive. Captive is 'frozen' and opponent loses 8 Force. If captive released, lose Effect. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: 'Oh, they've encased him in carbonite. He should be quite well protected. If he survived the freezing process, that is.'

combo: Carbon-Freezing + R2-Q2 (Artoo-Kyootoo) While at a scomp link, R2-Q2 allows you to look at the top 3 cards of your Reserve Deck during your draw phase. Next turn, activate to the desired destiny, and leave it on top of your Reserve. When the control phase comes up; you draw the number you want to freeze your captive.
Carbon-Freezing + Ugnaughts + Ugloste

front.title: •Carbonite Chamber Console
front.gametext: Deploy on Carbonite Chamber. Adds 3 to Carbon-Freezing destiny. Also, once during each of your turns, you may use 1 Force to take one Ugnaught, Prepare The Chamber or Carbon-Freezing into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Most often used to freeze Tibanna gas for transport. Modified by Ugloste to work on humans. Intended to capture Luke Skywalker, the Emperor's prize.

front.title: •Carbonite Chamber Console (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on Carbonite Chamber. Once per game may use 3 Force to to take [Virtual Block 6][Jabba's Palace] Boba Fett into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. While Jabba's Prize on Tatooine, you may add 1 to your destiny draws in battle anywhere, and once per game may take into hand Audience Chamber from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Immune to Sabotage and Uutkik.
front.lore: Most often used to freeze Tibanna gas for transport. Modified by Ugloste to work on humans. Intended to capture Luke Skywalker, the Emperor's prize.

front.title: •Carbonite Chamber Console (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on Carbonite Chamber. Once during opponent's turn, if a frozen captive on table, may activate 1 Force. Once per turn, may use 1 Force to take He's All Yours, Bounty Hunter into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Most often used to freeze Tibanna gas for transport. Modified by Ugloste to work on humans. Intended to capture Luke Skywalker, the Emperor's prize.

front.title: •Carida
front.gametext: Dark:  If you occupy, once during each of your control phases, you may lose 1 Force to retrieve one trooper into hand.  Light:  Force drain -1 here. If you do not occupy, all your troopers are forfeit -1.

pulledBy: You Cannot Hide Forever & Mobilization Points
combo: Carida + Aratech Corporation

front.title: •Carida: ISB Training Academy
front.gametext: Dark:  Once per game, if opponent just played an Interrupt with 'Rebel' in title, may stack it here.  Light:  Imperial Council Members are forfeit +2 here. Immune to Revolution.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Greg Shaw - New Jersey States 2004)

front.title: •Carnor Jax, Royal Guard
front.gametext: Imperials may not have their deploy costs increased (or be excluded from battle) by opponent here. When using a Force Pike, may draw two weapon destiny and choose one (may take the other into hand). Immune to attrition < 3.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Ryan Ritter - PC Volunteer Award 2009)

front.title: •Cease Fire!
front.gametext: If a battle was just initiated, lose 2 Force to prevent all weapons from being fired for remainder of battle. OR Target all your battle droids at a site. Targets may not have their forfeit value reduced for remainder of turn. OR Cancel Blaster Proficiency.
front.lore: The amount of time it takes for a subcommand to transfer to an officer battle droid, and then to the rest of his regiment, is .396 of a second.

cancels: Sorry About The Mess & Blaster Proficiency

front.title: •Chall Bekan
front.gametext: When deployed, you may take one non-unique alien into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Your aliens deploy -1 to same or adjacent Tatooine site.
front.lore: Male Morseerian leader. Methane breather. Has ties to Tatooine's Imperial government. Uses alien agents to maintain surveillance on Jabba and the Rebellion.

front.title: Charming To The Last
front.gametext: If Tarkin and a Rebel with ability > 2 are involved in the same battle, you may add one battle destiny (add two destiny if Rebel is Leia).
front.lore: 'You're far too trusting. Dantooine is too remote to make an effective demonstration. But don't worry...We will deal with your Rebel friends soon enough.'

front.title: Chevin
front.gametext: Power +2 and forfeit +1 while Ephant Mon is at Audience Chamber. When forfeited at same site as one of your alien leaders, may satisfy all remaining attrition against you.
front.lore: Most Chevin are mercenaries, gun runners and slavers. Have strong communities on their homeworld. Wear clothing only because others do.

front.title: Chevin (V)
front.gametext: When deployed, may use 1 Force to take a non-unique Trandoshan into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Power +1 while your other slaver present. While in battle at a site with two other slavers, may place this character out of play to satisfy all remaining attrition against you.
front.lore: Most Chevin are mercenaries, gun runners and slavers. Have strong communities on their homeworld. Wear clothing only because others do.

front.title: •Chief Bast
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Power +1 at same site as Tarkin. If a battle was just initiated at a system where Bast is present with your non-droid character, may 'evacuate' (relocate) both to a related site.
front.lore: Aide to Grand Moff Tarkin. Rarely underestimates enemies. Learned cunning and patience hunting big game as a youth.

front.title: •Chief Bast (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. While with Vader in a battle you lost, Imperials and Imperial starships may be forfeited directly from your hand (for printed forfeit value) to reduce attrition and/or battle damage.
front.lore: Aide to Grand Moff Tarkin. Rarely underestimates enemies. Learned cunning and patience hunting big game as a youth.

front.title: •Chief Retwin
front.gametext: May use 3 Force to 'hide' (be excluded) from a battle. May use 2 Force to target one device or weapon present which deploys on a site. Draw destiny. If destiny > target's deploy cost, target is lost.
front.lore: Highly skilled saboteur. Former Imperial sympathizer who worked for the defense forces on his home planet, Ralltiir. Joined the Empire after Ralltiir's subjugation.

combo: Chief Retwin + Defel(s)

front.title: •Chimaera
front.gametext: May add 6 pilots, 8 passengers, 2 vehicles and 4 TIEs. Has ship-docking capability. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Immune to attrition < 4 (< 5 while an Imperial leader aboard, < 6 while Thrawn aboard).
front.lore: Early model Imperial-class Star Destroyer. Acting command ship in the absence of Executor.

combo: Chimaera + Imperial Helmsman Draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.

front.title: •Chokk
front.gametext: Each of your alien leaders present is defense value +2. Power +3 while defending a battle. Adds 2 to his total weapon destiny when firing a blaster. Your characters present may not have their forfeit value reduced.
front.lore: Klatooinian bodyguard currently in the paid service of Jabba the Hutt. Chokk takes pride in his work, and he is very good at it.

combo: Chokk + Gamall Wironicc Power 11 while defending a battle and they double the weapons protection for your characters.
Chokk + Mighty Jabba + Ephant Mon

front.title: •Chokk (V)
front.gametext: Deploys -1 to Tatooine. While with your non-droid character, if a battle was just initiated here, may use 1 Force to place Chokk in Used Pile; Interrupts may not be played until the weapons segment ends.
front.lore: Klatooinian bodyguard currently in the paid service of Jabba the Hutt. Chokk takes pride in his work, and he is very good at it.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Greg Shaw - Coruscant Regionals 2004)

front.title: •Chyler
front.gametext: While on Cloud City, adds 4 to destiny of each of your miners drawn for battle destiny and adds 1 to your Force drains at related cloud sectors where you have a minor or refinery (adds 2 if both).
front.lore: Placed several ISB agents and Aqualish in the Cloud City miner's guild. Promised a position when the Empire took over Cloud City. She's still waiting.

front.title: •Close Call
front.gametext: USED: Cancel one asteroid destiny and cause it to be drawn again.  LOST: Lose 1 Force. Opponent must reveal the top card of Reserve Deck, Force Pile and Used Pile. Card(s) with lowest destiny number greater than zero are lost.
front.lore: If this little one doesn't pulverize you, the next one just might.

combo: Close Call + Scanning Crew

front.title: •Close Call (V)
front.gametext: USED: During battle, cancel and redraw a just drawn destiny.  LOST: A just drawn battle or weapon destiny is -3.
front.lore: If this little one doesn't pulverize you, the next one just might.

front.title: •Close Call (V)
front.gametext: USED: During battle, cancel and redraw a just drawn destiny.  LOST: A just drawn battle or weapon destiny is -3.
front.lore: If this little one doesn't pulverize you, the next one just might.

cancels: Any one destiny just drawn to cause a redraw

front.title: •Closed Door
front.gametext: Deploy on Back Door. Opponent may not deploy or move to Bunker. Effect canceled if opponent controls Back Door or Landing Platform or if you initiate at Force drain at Bunker. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Double durasteel doors are often enough to protect important Imperial installations.

pulledBy: You Cannot Hide Forever & Mobilization Points
combo: Closed Door + Endor: Back Door

front.title: Cloud Car
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot or passenger. At cloud sectors, power +1, may deploy as a 'react' and may move and be targeted by weapons like a starfighter. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 1.
front.lore: Bespin Motors' enclosed upper atmosphere craft. Utilizes a combination of ion engines and powerful repulsorlift drives to gain maximum power at high altitudes.

front.title: Cloud City Blaster
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on your warrior at a Cloud City site. May target a character or creature using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Target hit (and may not be used to satisfy attrition) if destiny > defense value.
front.lore: Relby-k23 blaster pistol. Inflicts severe pain prior to death. Safety known to fail. Although these blasters are on the civilian restricted list, Imperial agents use them anyway.

front.title: •••Cloud City Engineer
front.gametext: When present at a converted site, may use 2 Force to raise your site to the top. Also, when present at an opponent's site that has a Scomp link, your Force drains are +1 there. Ugnaughts deploy -1 to same Cloud City site.
front.lore: Maintenance specialist Lee Phenets. Assigned to ensure the smooth operation of Cloud City. One of the few humans respected by the city's Ugnaughts.

front.title: •Cloud City Occupation
front.gametext: Deploy on Bespin system if you occupy at least two Cloud City battleground sites. During each of your control phases, opponent loses 1 Force for each Cloud City battleground site you occupy. Canceled if opponent controls this system. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: 'I advise everyone to leave before more Imperial troops arrive.'

front.title: •Cloud City Sabacc
front.gametext: Requirements: a gambler, thief or smuggler on Cloud City. Wild cards (1-6): Lando and Weather Vane. Clone cards: Locations and Ugnaughts. (Gamblers may use clone cards as zeroes.) Stakes: One starfighter, weapon or device.
front.lore: Sabacc variant popular among the miners. Ugnaughts and chief administrators of Bespin's city in the clouds.

combo: Cloud City Sabacc + R2-Q2 (Artoo-Kyootoo) at a scomp link Get a peek at the top three cards of your Reserve Deck to get an idea of what your draw for sabacc will be.

front.title: Cloud City Trooper
front.gametext: Deploys only on Cloud City, but may move elsewhere. Power -1 when at a site other than a Cloud City site.
front.lore: Officially titled Cloud City Wing Guards. Some are holdovers from previous administrations which were more totalitarian. A moderate pay scale breeds corruption.

combo: Cloud City Trooper + Trooper Assault

front.title: •Cloud City: Carbonite Chamber
front.gametext: Dark:  If you control, add 2 to your Carbon-Freezing destiny.  Light:  If you occupy, subtract 2 from opponent's Carbon-Freezing destiny.

front.title: •Cloud City: Casino
front.gametext: Dark:  Whenever your gambler present here wins Cloud City Sabacc, retrieve 2 Force (3 if Lando).  Light:  Unless you have a gambler here, you may not use wild cards in Cloud City Sabacc.

front.title: •Cloud City: Chasm Walkway
front.gametext: Dark:  If Weather Vane on table, characters 'hit' here are instead immediately relocated there.  Light:  If Weather Vane on table, characters 'hit' here are instead immediately relocated there.

front.title: •Cloud City: Dining Room
front.gametext: Dark:  Your characters and character weapons may deploy here as a 'react.'  Light:  If you control, Blue Milk, Beru Stew and Yoda Stew are doubled. Jek is deploy -2 here.

front.title: •Cloud City: Dining Room (V)
front.gametext: Dark:  Your characters and weapons may deploy here as a 'react.'  Light:  Your non-[Permanent weapon] blasters here fire for free.

front.title: •Cloud City: Downtown Plaza
front.gametext: Dark:  Once during each of your control phases, may use 1 Force to retrieve one Cloud City location.  Light:  If you control, opponent's Downtown Plaza game text is canceled.

front.title: •Cloud City: East Platform (Docking Bay)
front.gametext: Dark:  Your docking bay transit from here requires 1 Force.  Light:  Your docking bay transit from here requires 2 Force.

front.title: •Cloud City: Incinerator
front.gametext: Dark:  If you control, during your control phase, may use 2 Force to retrieve one droid.  Light:  If you control Force drain -1 here.

front.title: •Cloud City: Interrogation Room
front.gametext: Dark:  For each captive present, Force drain +1 (+1 more if captive is a unique Rebel).  Light:  Force drain +1 here.

front.title: •Cloud City: Lower Corridor
front.gametext: Dark:  Your characters with lightsabers are each power +2 here.  Light:  If you control, Force drain -1 here.

front.title: •Cloud City: Port Town District
front.gametext: Dark:  Force drain +1 here. Your aliens are deploy -1 and power +1 here.  Light:  Force drain +1 here.

front.title: •Cloud City: Security Tower
front.gametext: Dark:  Once per game, may search your Reserve Deck, take Lando into hand and reshuffle.  Light:  If you control, instead of Force draining, may release one captive here.

front.title: •Cloud City: Security Tower (V)
front.gametext: Dark:  If Any Methods Necessary just played, may take Despair into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Aiiii! Aaa! Agggggggggg! is canceled.  Light:  If you control, may use 3 Force to release a captive here. Captive Pursuit is canceled.

front.title: •Cloud City: Security Tower (V)
front.gametext: Dark:  If Any Methods Necessary just played, may take Despair into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Aiiii! Aaa! Agggggggggg! is canceled.  Light:  If you control, may use 3 Force to release a captive here. Captive Pursuit is canceled.

front.title: •Cloud City: Upper Plaza Corridor
front.gametext: Dark:  During your move phase, you may move between here and any Cloud City site for free.  Light:  If you control, Force drain +1.

front.title: •Cloud City: Upper Walkway
front.gametext: Dark:  During your move phase, may move for free from here to any other Cloud City exterior site.  Light:  Force drain -1 here. If you control, opponent's Upper Walkway game text is canceled.

front.title: •Cloud City: West Gallery
front.gametext: Dark:  Your blasters present may fire at targets at nearest related exterior site.  Light:  Force drain -1 here.

front.title: <><><>Clouds
front.gametext: Dark:  If you control, once per turn, may add 1 to a Force drain at a related site. Starships are power and maneuver -2 here.  Light:  If you control, Force drain +1 here. Starships are power and maneuver -2 here.

combo: Clouds + Tibanna Gas Miner Add to Force drains at cloud sectors.

front.title: Cold Feet
front.gametext: Target a character at any marker site. Draw destiny. If site under 'nighttime conditions,' add 2 to destiny draw. If total destiny > ability, character may not move for remainder of turn.
front.lore: Wampas pack snow around the appendages of captured prey, making use of Hoth's cold environment to immobilize them.

front.title: Cold Feet (V)
front.gametext: Take a 'grabber' into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Sense.)  OR  Play a Defensive Shield from under your Starting Effect.  OR  Cancel Don't Forget The Droids, It Can Wait, or Surprise Assault.  OR  Suspend Bacta Tank ('patient' remains on Effect), Bo Shuda, Goo Nee Tay, or Mantellian Savrip for remainder of turn.
front.lore: Wampas pack snow around the appendages of captured prey, making use of Hoth's cold environment to immobilize them.

front.title: Cold Feet (V)
front.gametext: Play a Defensive Shield from under your Starting Effect. [Immune to Sense] OR Cancel Mantellian Savrip or Surprise Assault. OR Cancel an attempt to remove a just-lost character from opponent's Lost Pile.
front.lore: Wampas pack snow around the appendages of captured prey, making use of Hoth's cold environment to immobilize them.

front.title: •Collapsing Corridor
front.gametext: If you just moved an AT-AT to innermost marker, target one underground site on Hoth. Draw destiny. Target 'collapsed' if destiny > marker number.
front.lore: Most of Echo Base was tunneled out of a huge glacier by Rebel engineers. Its icy passageways could not withstand Imperial shelling.

front.title: Collateral Damage
