front.title: •Jabba's Palace: Dungeon
front.gametext: Dark:  Whenever a bounty hunter delivers a captive here, retrieve 2 Force (once per captive).  Light:  If you control, may use 3 Force to release an imprisoned captive here.

canceledBy: B'omarr Monk cancels Jabba's Palace Dark Side game text where present

front.title: •Jabba's Palace: Entrance Cavern
front.gametext: Dark:  Bib Fortuna deploys -3 here. If you control, with a Gamorrean here, Force drain +1 here.  Light:  If you control, Force drain +1 here and your aliens deploy -2 here.

canceledBy: B'omarr Monk cancels Jabba's Palace Dark Side game text where present

front.title: •Jabba's Palace: Lower Passages
front.gametext: Dark:  During your move phase, your aliens may move between here and any Jabba's Palace site.  Light:  While your Lando here, opponent's Lower Passages game text is canceled. Force drain -1 here.

canceledBy: B'omarr Monk cancels Jabba's Palace Dark Side game text where present

front.title: •Jabba's Palace: Rancor Pit
front.gametext: Dark:  Dark Waters may deploy here. If a creature present, cards cannot move from here.  Light:  If your character here is 'eaten,' opponent retrieves Force equal to character's forfeit.

canceledBy: B'omarr Monk cancels Jabba's Palace Dark Side game text where present

front.title: •Jabba's Prize/Jabba's Prize
front.gametext: {Deploys only at start of game if Carbon Chamber Testing is on table to Security Tower, frozen and imprisoned, (instead of a Rebel from opponent's Reserve Deck). If You Can Either Profit By This... is on table, opponent does not deploy Han at start of game (relocate Jabba's Prize to Audience Chamber, flip Carbon Chamber Testing, and you may not move or transfer Jabba's Prize)}. May not be placed in Reserve Deck. Jabba's Prize is a persona of Han only while on table. If Jabba's Prize leaves table, place it out of play. May not be targeted by We're The Bait or Someone Who Loves You. While Jabba's Prize is at Audience Chamber, Jabba is power +3, defense value +3, and adds 3 to his immunity to attrition. If Jabba's Prize was just released, opponent may replace it with any Han from hand, Used Pile, or Reserve Deck; reshuffle (if not replaced, place Jabba's Prize out of play).
front.lore: Han Solo was frozen in carbonite to test the process Vader planned to use on Luke. When Boba Fett delivered Han to Jabba, the vile gangster called him his 'favorite decoration.'

back.title: •Jabba's Prize/Jabba's Prize
back.gametext: {Deploys only at start of game if Carbon Chamber Testing is on table to Security Tower, frozen and imprisoned, (instead of a Rebel from opponent's Reserve Deck). If You Can Either Profit By This... is on table, opponent does not deploy Han at start of game (relocate Jabba's Prize to Audience Chamber, flip Carbon Chamber Testing, and you may not move or transfer Jabba's Prize)}. May not be placed in Reserve Deck. Jabba's Prize is a persona of Han only while on table. If Jabba's Prize leaves table, place it out of play. May not be targeted by We're The Bait or Someone Who Loves You. While Jabba's Prize is at Audience Chamber, Jabba is power +3, defense value +3, and adds 3 to his immunity to attrition. If Jabba's Prize was just released, opponent may replace it with any Han from hand, Used Pile, or Reserve Deck; reshuffle (if not replaced, place Jabba's Prize out of play).
back.lore: Han Solo was frozen in carbonite to test the process Vader planned to use on Luke. When Boba Fett delivered Han to Jabba, the vile gangster called him his 'favorite decoration.'

front.title: •Jabba's Sail Barge
front.gametext: Deploys only on Tatooine; you may immediately deploy Passenger Deck from your Reserve Deck and reshuffle. May add 1 driver and 7 passengers. Your aliens deploy -1 aboard.
front.lore: Ubrikkian sail barge. Custom built for Jabba with an armored hull and weaponry. Top speed of 100 kph. Used by the Hutt crimelord on his many trips to Mos Eisley.

front.title: •Jabba's Sail Barge (V)
front.gametext: Deploys only on Tatooine. May add 1 driver and 8 passengers. Scum And Villainy may deploy aboard. During your deploy phase, may deploy one Jabba, Pote, or Passenger Deck aboard from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Immune to attrition < 6.
front.lore: Ubrikkian sail barge. Custom built for Jabba with an armored hull and weaponry. Top speed of 100 kph. Used by the Hutt crimelord on his many trips to Mos Eisley.

front.title: •Jabba's Sail Barge (V)
front.gametext: May add 1 alien driver and 8 passengers. Your vehicle weapons deploy free aboard. Once per turn, may deploy Passenger Deck or a skiff here from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. While on Tatooine with a skiff, Force drain +1 here.
front.lore: Ubrikkian sail barge. Custom built for Jabba with an armored hull and weaponry. Top speed of 100 kph. Used by the Hutt crimelord on his many trips to Mos Eisley.

front.title: •Jabba's Sail Barge: Passenger Deck
front.gametext: Dark:  If you occupy, Sail Barge is immune to attrition.  Light:  Your characters may enter/exit here for 4 Force each.

front.title: •Jabba's Space Cruiser
front.gametext: Deploys and moves like a starfighter. May add 2 alien pilots and 6 passengers. Turbolaser Battery may deploy aboard as a 'react.' When Jabba aboard, moves for free and immune to attrition.
front.lore: Flying fortress of Jabba Desilijic Tiure. Reaches speeds of 800 kph in atmosphere. The crime lord installed hidden gunports as an unpleasant surprise for would-be pirates.

front.title: •Jabba's Space Cruiser (V)
front.gametext: Deploys and moves like a starfighter. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. May add 1 alien pilot and 6 passengers. Your [Independent Starship] starships may deploy here as a 'react'. If Jabba here, immune to attrition.
front.lore: Flying fortress of Jabba Desilijic Tiure. Reaches speeds of 800 kph in atmosphere. The crime lord installed hidden gunports as an unpleasant surprise for would-be pirates.

front.title: •Jabba's Space Cruiser (V)
front.gametext: May add 1 alien pilot and 6 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. When deployed, you may deploy an alien leader aboard for free from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Immune to attrition < 5.
front.lore: Flying fortress of Jabba Desilijic Tiure. Reaches speeds of 800 kph in atmosphere. The crime lord installed hidden gunports as an unpleasant surprise for would-be pirates.

front.title: •Jabba's Through With You
front.gametext: If your bounty hunter just fired a character weapon during a battle, add one battle destiny. OR During your deploy phase, deploy one character weapon on your bounty hunter from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: 'Klees ka tlanko ya oska.'

pulls: One character weapon to deploy on your bounty hunter

front.title: •Jabba's Trophies
front.gametext: Deploy on table. If Jabba just Force drained (or won a battle), stack top card of opponent's Lost Pile here; may draw top card of your Reserve Deck. If 4 or more cards here, may return this Effect and a character with Jabba at Audience Chamber to owner's hand. Immune to Alter.
front.lore: Oola had to choose between giving in to Jabba's constant advances or resisting him and inciting his wrath.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Jonathan Murray)

front.title: •Jabba's Twerps
front.gametext: If opponent just initiated battle where your alien leader is present, deploy up to three non-unique aliens to that location from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR Once per game, retrieve 1 Force for each of your alien leaders present at any battleground sites.
front.lore: 'Look, Jabba, next time you want to see me, come see me yourself. Don't send one of these twerps.'

pulls: Three non-unique aliens where your alien leader is present

front.title: •Jakku
front.gametext: Dark:  Your [First Order] starships move from here for free.  Light:  Unless your Resistance character or [Resistance] starship here, you may not draw more than one battle destiny here.

front.title: •Jakku: Landing Site
front.gametext: Dark:  Once per turn, if your First Order character here, may deploy a Jakku battleground from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  Light:

front.title: •Jakku: Tuanul Village
front.gametext: Dark:  First Order characters are each power +1 here.  Light:  Resistance characters are each defense value and forfeit +1 here.

front.title: •Jango Fett
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. May deploy Jet Pack on him for free from Reserve Deck; reshuffle; he moves using it for -1 Force. Permanent weapon is Dual Blasters (may lose 1 Force to target a Jedi; until end of turn, choose: target may not fire weapons OR target loses immunity to attrition).
front.lore: Trade Federation.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Chris Clarke - Australia Nationals 2007)

front.title: •Jango Fett
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power and 1 to maneuver of anything he pilots. Adds one battle destiny with opponent's Jedi, [Maintenance] card, or [Permanent Weapon] card. May be targeted by Hidden Weapons, If about to be lost, may take Boba Fett into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Trade Federation bounty hunter.

cancels: Mace Windu (V) prevents Fetts from adding battle destiny draws at same location

front.title: •Jango Fett, The Assassin
front.gametext: Adds 3 to the power of anything he pilots. Adds one battle destiny. SD-17 Homing Missile may deploy on (and is a matching weapon for) him, fires for free, and when fired may go to Lost Pile instead. While piloted by two Fetts (unless your [Virtual Block 4] objective on table), Slave I is immune to attrition < 9.
front.lore: Trade Federation. Assassin. Scout.

front.title: •Jango Fett, The Assassin (AI)
front.gametext: Adds 3 to the power of anything he pilots. Adds one battle destiny. SD-17 Homing Missile may deploy on (and is a matching weapon for) him, fires for free, and when fired may go to Lost Pile instead. While piloted by two Fetts (unless your [Virtual Block 4] objective on table), Slave I is immune to attrition < 9.
front.lore: Trade Federation. Assassin. Scout.

front.title: •Janus Greejatus
front.gametext: Deploys -3 to Emperor's site. When with Emperor at a battleground site, adds 1 to your Force drains here. Once per turn, you may use 1 Force to place a card from hand to bottom of Used Pile and draw top card of Reserve Deck. Immune to attrition < 3.
front.lore: Imperial council member. Very cruel at heart. Has lusted for power his entire life. Predictable and controllable.

pulls: Top card from Reserve Deck for 1 Force
combo: Janus Greejatus + Operational As Planned Stack three high destinies for tracking.
Janus Greejatus + Emperor Palpatine

front.title: •Janus Greejatus (V)
front.gametext: Agendas: logistics, rule. Once per turn, if at Conference Room and you just drew a non-Epic Event destiny < your total Influence here, may use 2 Force to cancel and redraw that destiny or use 4 Force to add 2 to that destiny.
front.lore: Imperial council member. Very cruel at heart. Has lusted for power his entire life. Predictable and controllable.

front.title: Jawa
front.gametext: Deploys only on Tatooine. To deploy, requires 1 Force from each players' Force Pile. Power +1 on Tatooine. While with another Jawa, if opponent just initiated a Force drain at adjacent site, may use 2 Force to reduce it by 1.
front.lore: Every now and then, Jawas will pause in their scavenging duties to take in a Podrace. Many believe this is only because they want to be first to a crash scene.

pulledBy: Herat to deploy to same location

front.title: Jawa
front.gametext: To deploy, requires 1 Force from each players' Force Pile. Cannot deploy otherwise. Deploy only on Tatooine, but may move elsewhere.
front.lore: Small, rodent-like scavenger species. Refurbish and sell droids. Nest in sandcrawlers. Considered to be pests by most species.

pulledBy: Herat to deploy to same location

front.title: Jawa Blaster
front.gametext: Deploy on your Jawa. May target a character or creature for free. Draw destiny. If destiny -1 > defense value, target hit. If destiny = 0, Jawa Blaster 'explodes' (weapon and character firing it are lost).
front.lore: Built from scavenged parts, Jawa blaster are not required to adhere to any design standards. An etching on this stock warns 'datinni greb zroom.'

front.title: •Jawa Pack
front.gametext: To deploy (on your side of table), requires 3 Force from both players' Force Piles. Cannot deploy otherwise. All your Jawas are forfeit +1.
front.lore: Jawas travel in packs for protection. They use ambush tactics against unwary droids in the canyons of the Jundland Wastes. 'Aeeeyaa!'

combo: Jawa Pack + First Strike (Psychobabble)

front.title: •Jawa Pack (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Your unique (•) Jawas are defense value +1. During battles at exterior Tatooine sites where your unique (•) Jawa is participating, may add one destiny to your total power.
front.lore: Jawas travel in packs for protection. They use ambush tactics against unwary droids in the canyons of the Jundland Wastes. 'Aeeeyaa!'

front.title: •Jedha
front.gametext: Dark:  While you control, your superlaser weapon destiny draws are +1.  Light:  Unless Baze, Bodhi, Chirrut, or Saw here, Force drain -1 here.

front.title: •Jedha: Jedha City
front.gametext: Dark:  May be deployed instead of Alderaan by Set Your Course For Alderaan.  Light:  Baze, Chirrut, and Saw deploy -1 here.

front.title: •••Jet Pack
front.gametext: Use 3 Force to deploy on any alien (except Boba Fett or Jabba). May 'fly' (landspeed = 3). May use 2 Force to move as a 'react'.
front.lore: Mitrinomon Z-6 jet pack. Exhaust vents are used to maneuver in midflight. Gyro-stabilizer automatically applies counterthrust when landing.

canceledBy: Game text canceled by Mandalorian Mishap

front.title: •••Jet Pack (V)
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on your alien warrior (free Jodo Kast or any Fett).  Character 'flies' (landspeed = 3 and maneuver = 6), may fire weapons for free, and may move as a 'react' for +1 Force.
front.lore: Mitrinomon Z-6 jet pack. Exhaust vents are used to maneuver in midflight. Gyro-stabilizer automatically applies counterthrust when landing.

front.title: •Jodo Kast
front.gametext: When in battle, if opponent draws more than one battle destiny, may cancel one. Once per turn, when firing a rifle or blaster, may target for free and add 2 to total weapon destiny. May be targeted by Hidden Weapons. May 'fly' (landspeeed = 3).
front.lore: Bounty Hunter and scout. Perfectionist. Equipped with mandalorian armor and a jet pack. He doesn't mind being mistaken for Boba Fett. Occasionally works for Black Sun.

front.title: •Jodo Kast (V)
front.gametext: Once per game, if a character was just 'transported' here by Nabrun Leids, may capture that character.  At same site, opponent must first use 1 Force to fire a weapon.  May be targeted by Hidden Weapons.  May 'fly' (landspeed = 3).
front.lore: Bounty Hunter and scout. Perfectionist. Equipped with mandalorian armor and a jet pack. He doesn't mind being mistaken for Boba Fett. Occasionally works for Black Sun.

front.title: •Join Me!
front.gametext: Use 3 Force if Luke was just 'hit' by a lightsaber swung by Vader. Opponent must choose: Place Luke in owner's Used Pile OR Luke may not be forfeited this battle and crosses to the Dark Side at the end of the turn if still on table (is no longer 'hit').
front.lore: '...And together, we can rule the galaxy as father and son!'

front.title: •Join Me! (V)
front.gametext: During battle, lose 1 Force to target a Skywalker present with your character armed with a lightsaber. Target is power = 0. OR If you just hit a Skywalker with a lightsaber, opponent must lose 3 Force or place Skywalker (and all cards on them) in Used Pile.
front.lore: '...And together, we can rule the galaxy as father and son!'

front.title: •Join Us Or Die
front.gametext: Deploy on your Throne Room. While Emperor and Vader here, Take Your Father's Place does not deplete Life Force or cause Force loss. Once per turn, may deploy a docking bay or So Be It, Jedi from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. 'Battle' on Insignificant Rebellion is treated as 'battle or duel. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Vader had to show Luke that giving in to the dark side of the Force was his only destiny.

front.title: •J'Quille
front.gametext: Power +2 on Hoth. At the start of a battle, may cause one opponent's character of ability < 3 present to be excluded from the battle. While at Audience Chamber, all your other Whipids are forfeit +2.
front.lore: Whiphid spy in league with Lady Valarian. Yearns for battle. Enjoys hearing the screams of his victims. Plotting to kill Jabba.

combo: J'Quille + Nevar Yalnal

front.title: •J'Quille (V)
front.gametext: May deploy to a shielded site, and, for remainder of that turn, suspends 'Hoth Energy Shield Rules' at his site. Once per game, when deployed to a site, opponent loses 1 Force for each Light Side character present.
front.lore: Whiphid spy in league with Lady Valarian. Yearns for battle. Enjoys hearing the screams of his victims. Plotting to kill Jabba.

front.title: •Judicator
front.gametext: May add 6 pilots, 8 passengers, 2 vehicles and 4 TIEs. Has ship-docking capability. Permanent pilot provides ability of 1. Each of its weapon destiny draws is +2. Starfighters it 'hits' are power = 0.
front.lore: Incorporates latest design modifications from Kuat Drive Yards. Targeting computers outfitted with antenna locking, in-line calibration and helical-motion extrapolators.

combo: Judicator + Imperial Helmsman Draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.

front.title: <>Jungle
front.gametext: Dark:  May not deploy to Bespin, Coruscant, Hoth, Kessel or Tatooine. Your aliens and creature vehicles are each power +1 here.  Light:  May not deploy to Bespin, Coruscant, Hoth, Kessel or Tatooine. Force Drain -1 here. Your attrition against opponent is -2 here.

front.title: •Juno Eclipse, Black Leader
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything she pilots.  Deploys -1 to starships.  Naboo Blaster is a matching weapon for her.  While with Galen at a site, adds one battle destiny.  During your control phase, may use 2 Force to retrieve a card with 'back' in title.  Immune to attrition < 3.
front.lore: A shining example of Imperial honor and bravery. Female.

front.title: •Juno Eclipse, Black Leader (AI)
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything she pilots.  Deploys -1 to starships.  Naboo Blaster is a matching weapon for her.  While with Galen at a site, adds one battle destiny.  During your control phase, may use 2 Force to retrieve a card with 'back' in title.  Immune to attrition < 3.
front.lore: A shining example of Imperial honor and bravery. Female.

front.title: •Juri Juice
front.gametext: Deploy on any alien if Cantina, Mos Eisley or Jabba's Sail Barge on table. That alien may not use ability in battles (if Kabe, she also cannot 'steal'). Utinni Effect canceled by moving that alien to one of those sites without 'driving' a vehicle.
front.lore: Popular beverage served in many cantinas and tapcafes. Has intoxicating effect on many species. Favorite drink of Kabe, Chadra-Fan thief of Mos Eisley.

front.title: •Justifier
front.gametext: Lost if your Endor or your other capital starship on table.  May add 1 admiral as a pilot.  Permanent pilots aboard provide total ability of 4.  Immune to attrition < 7 (< 10 if your admiral aboard).

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Justin Desai - Origins Champion 2003)

front.title: •Kashyyyk
front.gametext: Dark:  Force drain +1 here. If you control, all Wookiees on table are forfeit -3.  Light:  Your starships with any Wookiee aboard are power and forfeit +2 here.

front.title: Kashyyyk Operative
front.gametext: While at a Kashyyyk site: adds 1 to your Force drains there, is power +1 (or +2 if your Trandoshan is on Kashyyyk) and, once during each of your deploy phases, may deploy one site to Kashyyyk from Reserve Deck- reshuffle.
front.lore: Hunters who track down escaped Wookiee slaves and report on their location. The Empire and Trandoshans pay a high price for that kind of information.

front.title: •Kashyyyk: Forest Maze
front.gametext: Dark:  During your control phase, if you occupy with at least two Trandoshans, opponent loses 1 Force.  Light:  Unless you control, Jedi deploy +1 to Kashyyyk and may 'swing' lightsabers only once per battle there.

front.title: •Kashyyyk: Slaving Camp Headquarters
front.gametext: Dark:  Once per turn, may use 1 Force to deploy a battleground site to Kashyyyk and/or a card with 'Hunting' in title.  Light:  Force drain +1 here. If you control with a Wookiee, Trandoshans are deploy +1 to Kashyyyk.

front.title: •Kashyyyk: Wookiee Slaving Camp
front.gametext: Dark:  Jabba's Sail Barge may deploy here.  If your Trandoshan present, Force Drain +1 here.  Light:  While a Trandoshan present and you have no Wookiees on Kashyyyk, you may not modify or cancel opponent's force drains here.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Tom Frafjord - Rosemount Championship 2008)

front.title: •Katana
front.gametext: May add 3 pilots, 6 passengers and 4 TIEs. Your other Dreadnaughts here are power +1, forfeit +2, Heroic, and Immune to attrition < 4. Permanent pilot provides ability of 3. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Introduced during the Clone Wars. 600 meters long. Some have cargo space converted to TIE hanger bays. Still used to maintain an Imperial presence in the Outer Rim.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Thomas Caspersen - Sandvika V-Lite 2005)

front.title: •Keder The Black
front.gametext: Deploys only to a site as an Undercover spy (-2 on Coruscant). During your control phase, may 'break cover' to target one character with politics present. Draw destiny. If destiny +1 > target's politics, target and Keder are lost.
front.lore: A highly paid assassin and spy, Keder has infiltrated the Senate disguised as a Coruscant Guard. The identity of his target and his employer remains a mystery to all but him.

combo: Keder The Black+ Little Real Power
Keder The Black + Supreme Chancellor Valorum
Keder The Black + Nevar Yalnal

front.title: •Keder The Black (V)
front.gametext: While at Senate: Sidious is politics +3; 'senators on Squabling Delegates is treated as 'Coruscant Guards;' and may lose 1 Force to place Keder and an opponent's [Coruscant] Political Effect (or [Coruscant] senator here) in owner's Lost Pile.
front.lore: A highly paid assassin and spy, Keder has infiltrated the Senate disguised as a Coruscant Guard. The identity of his target and his employer remains a mystery to all but him.

front.title: •Kessel
front.gametext: Dark:  Your starships deploy -1 here, -2 if Tarkin is aboard a starship here. If you control, Kessel Run is canceled.  Light:  Total ability of 6 or more required for you to draw battle destiny here.

front.title: Kessel Operative
front.gametext: While at a Kessel site: adds 1 to your Force drains there, is power +1 (or +2 if your smuggler is on Kessel) and, once during each of your deploy phases, may deploy one site to Kessel from Reserve Deckreshuffle.
front.lore: Mercenaries that make a profit selling materials to the troops stationed on Kessel. Help the Empire prevent escape attempts by the prisoners there.

front.title: Kessel Surveillance System
front.gametext: Deploy on a Kessel site. Opponents Force drains are -1 here. Oncer per turn, if you just lost a card from Reserve Deck, may place a 'spice' card in owners Lost Pile to satisfy 1 additional Force loss. Once per game, may deploy Moruth Doole here from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Remote surveillance viewers with droid controllers supplement security. Can activate alarms and automated weapons when needed, bringing help to endangered locations.

front.title: •Kessel: Spice Mines - Administrator's Office
front.gametext: Dark:  If opponent just used this site's game text, may take into hand any card from reserve deck; reshuffle (or retrieve into hand) any one card.  Light:  Kessel may not be converted. May lose 1 Force to place a 'spice' card in owner's Used Pile.

front.title: •Kessel: Spice Mines - Docking Bay
front.gametext: Dark:  Your docking bay transit from here requires 1 Force (free if your smuggler present).  Light:  Your docking bay transit from here requires 3 Force (free if your smuggler present).

front.title: •Kessel: Spice Mines - Extraction Facility
front.gametext: Dark:  During your control phase, may use 1 Force to place a 'spice' card in owner's Used Pile.  Light:  If you occupy, may use 3 Force to place a 'spice' card out of play.

front.title: •Kessel: Spice Mines - Prison
front.gametext: Dark:  Whenever a droid is imprisoned here, may retrieve 3 Force (once per captive).  Light:  If you control, may release any captives imprisoned here (may retrieve 1 Force for each).

front.title: Ket Maliss
front.gametext: Deploy on your non-warrior character (except droids) to give that character [Warrior] skill. OR Deploy on your warrior. That character is power +1. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Assassins are highly valued by Jabba the Hutt and other gangsters. Prince Xizor's 'shadow killer,' has unknown but undoubtably lethal business in Mos Eisley.

front.title: Ket Maliss (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table.  Unless Emperor Palpatine on table, Black Sun agents are defense value +1 and forfeit +2.  Once per turn, may use 1 Force to deploy one Beedo, Dannik Jerriko, Greedo, Hem Dazon, Reegesk, or a docking bay from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Assassins are highly valued by Jabba the Hutt and other gangsters. Prince Xizor's 'shadow killer,' has unknown but undoubtably lethal business in Mos Eisley.

front.title: •Ket Maliss, Shadow Killer
front.gametext: Adds two to the power of anything he pilots. While with opponent's character of ability > 2, Ket Maliss is power +1 and defense value + 2 and draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. Whenever opponent's character was lost from same site, opponent loses 1 Force.
front.lore: Assassins are highly valued by Jabba the Hutt and other gangsters. Ket Maliss, Prince Xizor's 'shadow killer,' has unknown but undoubtedly lethal business in Mos Eisley. Assassin.

front.title: •Kiffex
front.gametext: Dark:  If you occupy with exactly 2 starships, your total power here is +2 and Tonnika Sisters anywhere are doubled.  Light:  If you occupy with exactly 2 starships, your total power here is +2.

front.title: Kiffex Operative
front.gametext: While at a Kiffex site: adds 1 to your Force drains there, is power +1 (or +2 if your spy is on Kiffex) and, once during each of your deploy phases, may deploy one site to Kiffex from Reserve Deck- reshuffle.
front.lore: Couriers. Watchful for any kind of activity by the Alliance or the Empire. Sell their information to anyone willing to buy.

front.title: •Kill Them Immediately
front.gametext: Use 5 Force to reveal opponent's hand. If opponent has no duplicate cards there, place this Interrupt in Used Pile. OtherwiseUSED: place a revealed card in opponent's Used Pile.  LOST: all cards opponent has two or more of are lost. (Immune to Sense.)
front.lore: Darth Sidious instructed Nute Gunray to dispose of the Jedi ambassadors. Rune Haako was not so confident.

front.title: Kintan Strider
front.gametext: If opponent just forfeited or lost a character, use 1 Force to regenerate one of your own characters. Retrieve the character closest to the top of your Lost Pile into your hand.
front.lore: A dejarik of a ferocious creature with incredible healing abilities. Extinct on the homeworld of Kintan, but used as a guard beasts by many Hutt gangsters.

front.title: •Kir Kanos
front.gametext: When armed with a Force pike, adds one battle destiny. Once during each of your deploy phases, lose 1 Force or place Kanos and cards deployed on him in owner's Used Pile (if Emperor on table, may use 1 Force instead).
front.lore: Fiercely devoted Royal Guard. Feels deeply indebted to those who risk their life for him. Unaware of the extent of Palpatine's atrocities and cruelty.

front.title: •Kir Kanos (V)
front.gametext: When deployed, may take a Royal Guard into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. During battle, if present at a site with an Imperial, once per game may cancel a non-[Immune to Sense] Interrupt.
front.lore: Fiercely devoted Royal Guard. Feels deeply indebted to those who risk their life for him. Unaware of the extent of Palpatine's atrocities and cruelty.

front.title: •Kir Kanos With Force Pike
front.gametext: Heroic. Permanent weapon is Force Pike (may target a character for free; draw destiny; target hit, and its power = 0, if destiny +1 > defense value). Your characters here are immune to Cantina Brawl, Fallen Portal, and Rebel Barrier.
front.lore: Fiercely devoted Royal Guard. Feels deeply indebted to those who risk their life for him. Unaware of the extent of Palpatine's atrocities and cruelty.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Kevin Shannon - World Champion 2008)

front.title: •Kithaba
front.gametext: Deploys only on Tatooine. Adds 1 to power of anything he pilots. Power = 1 + ability of opponent's highest-ability character present.
front.lore: Famous Klatooinian assassin. After disposing of a few more prisoners, plans to quit the killing business and become a full-time musician. Rises to the challenges he faces.

front.title: •Kitik Keed'kak
front.gametext: Immediately lost if at same site as overprotective mother, Kal'Faln C'ndros. Cannot board starfighters or enclosed vehicles.
front.lore: A female insectoid Yam'rii. Very strong and easily angered. Known for stealth, but also has good technological aptitude. Meat eater. Loves eggs.

front.title: •Kitik Keed'kak (V)
front.gametext: During battle, may add 1 to your attrition against opponent for each opponent's character present. May not deploy to or board starfighters or enclosed vehicles.
front.lore: A female insectoid Yam'rii. Very strong and easily angered. Known for stealth, but also has good technological aptitude. Meat eater. Loves eggs.

front.title: •Klaatu
front.gametext: Deploys only on Tatooine. Power +2 when with Barada or defending a battle a a Jabba's Palace site. During a battle at same site, may forfeit a transport vehicle present to satisfy all remaining battle damage and attrition against you.
front.lore: Kadas'sa'Nikto. Barada's main assistant. In charge of repairing Jabba's skiffs. Gambler. Always tries to make it back to the palace to watch the Rancor get fed.

front.title: •Knowledge And Defense
front.gametext: Insert in opponent's Reserve Deck. When Effect reaches top it is lost, but opponent may not initiate any battles for remainder of turn. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: 'A Jedi uses the Force for knowledge and defense, never for attack.'

canceledBy: You Cannot Hide Forever - Defensive Shield
You Cannot Hide Forever (V) - Defensive Shield
Your Insight Serves You Well - Defensive Shield
Your Insight Serves You Well (V) - Defensive Shield

front.title: •Knowledge And Defense (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table with up to 15 cards from outside your deck face-down under here. Four times per game, may play a card from here (as if from hand). Unless canceling your Interrupt, opponent may not play Recoil In Fear until the end of your first turn.
front.lore: 'A Jedi uses the Force for knowledge and defense, never for attack.'

front.title: •Knowledge And Defense (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table with up to any number of Defensive Shields from outside your deck face-down under here. Four times per game, may play a Defensive Shield from here (as if from hand). Unless canceling your Interrupt, opponent may not play Recoil In Fear until the end of your first turn.
front.lore: 'A Jedi uses the Force for knowledge and defense, never for attack.'

front.title: •Krayt Dragon
front.gametext: Ferocity = 6 + two destiny. Habitat: deserts and Tatooine exterior sites. May not deploy to an occupied site. If defeated, opponent may draw destiny and retrieve Force equal to destiny draw.
front.lore: Krayt dragons have beautiful and valuable pearls inside them as a gizzard to grind up food. Their fierceness is legendary. Up to 10 meters tall and 30 meters long.

front.title: •Krayt Dragon Bones
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on table. Each opponent's destiny draw, you do the following: (0) Put top used card in hand; (1) lose 1 Force; (2) activate 1 Force; (3) lose this Effect; (4) retrieve 1 Force; (5) deploy a character for free; (6+) nothing.
front.lore: Tusken Raiders, Jawas and other desert dwellers believe that krayt dragon bones possess mystical powers that can bring good or bad luck.

combo: Krayt Dragon Bones + Taym Dren-garen
canceledBy: Taym Dren-garen cancels any result of Krayt Dragon Bones when on Tatooine

front.title: •Krayt Dragon Bones (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table.  Womp Rats are not [Selective Creature].  Once per turn, may deploy a creature (except a parasite) or a dewback from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  Your ferocious creatures are deploy -2 and ferocity +1.  Whenever you retrieve Force because a creatue has eaten a card, you need only use X-2 Force for Aim High (to a minimum of 1). (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Tusken Raiders, Jawas and other desert dwellers believe that krayt dragon bones possess mystical powers that can bring good or bad luck.

front.title: •Krennic, Death Star Commandant
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Once per turn, if Death Star orbiting a battleground, may peek at top two cards of your Force Pile and take one into hand. Once per game, may take a non-unique Star Destroyer into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Commander. Leader.

front.title: •Kuat
front.gametext: Dark:  Your starships move as a 'react' (for free) to a battle here.  Light:  If you occupy, all Star Destroyers are deploy +1 (+3 if you control). Your movement to here requires +1 Force.

pulledBy: You Cannot Hide Forever & Mobilization Points

front.title: •Kuat Drive Yards
front.gametext: Deploy on Kuat system. All your Imperial-class Star Destroyers are immune to attrition < 4. Once during each of your deploy phases, may deploy one Imperial-class Star Destroyer here from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter while you occupy Kuat.)
front.lore: Company that produces current generation of Star Destroyers, as well as Nebulon-B Frigates. Ship yards are extremely well defended.

front.title: •Kuat Drive Yards (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table.  Unique (•) Imperial-Class Star Destroyers draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise and are immune to attrition < 4.  During your deploy phase, may use 2 Force to deploy a battleground system from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  We're In Attack Position Now is canceled. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Company that produces current generation of Star Destroyers, as well as Nebulon-B Frigates. Ship yards are extremely well defended.

front.title: •Kuat Drive Yards (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Unique (•) Imperial-class Star Destroyers draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise and are immune to attrition < 4. During your deploy phase, may use 2 Force to deploy a battleground system from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. We're In Attack Position Now is canceled. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Company that produces current generation of Star Destroyers, as well as Nebulon-B Frigates. Ship yards are extremely well defended.

front.title: •Kylo Ren
front.gametext: Adds one destiny to total power when with a [First Order] shuttle. While present at a battleground, Honor Of The Jedi is suspended. Whenever a player loses a battle here, that player loses 2 Force. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Leader.

front.title: •Kylo Ren With Lightsaber
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Permanent weapon is •Kylo's Lightsaber (may target a character for free; draw 2 destiny; target hit, its forfeit = 0, and opponent loses 1 Force if total destiny > defense value; otherwise you lose 1 Force).
front.lore: Leader.

front.title: •Kylo Ren's Command Shuttle
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot and 3 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. May deploy to exterior sites. When deployed, may deploy Kylo aboard (deploy -2) from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Takes off and lands for free.
front.lore: Blank.

pulledBy: You Know What I've Come For

front.title: •Kylo Ren's Lightsaber
front.gametext: Deploy on Kylo. May add 1 to Force drain where present. May target a character or creature for free. Draw two destiny. If total destiny > defense value, target hit, its forfeit = 0, and both players lose 1 Force.
front.lore: Blank.

pulledBy: I Will Finish What You Started

front.title: •Kylo Ren's TIE Silencer
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot. Kylo deploys -3 aboard. While Kylo piloting, immune to attrition < 5 and, unless Leia here, once per battle may lose immunity to attrition to 'spin': add maneuver to power.
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: •Labria
front.gametext: Once each turn, during your control phase, you may reveal the top card of your Reserve Deck to both players. If it is a vehicle or starship, card is immediately lost. Otherwise, return it to the top of your Reserve Deck, Force Pile or Used Pile.
front.lore: Information broker. Spy. Devaronian males instinctively have 'wanderlust.' Frustrated that he must be reclusive due to shady past. Suffers from prejudice due to devilish appearance.

combo: Labria + Nevar Yalnal

front.title: •Labria (V)
front.gametext: Once per game, may deploy Undercover on Labria from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. During your control phase, may reveal top card of Reserve Deck. Place revealed card on top of Force Pile, Reserve Deck, or Used Pile.
front.lore: Information broker. Spy. Devaronian males instinctively have 'wanderlust.' Frustrated that he must be reclusive due to shady past. Suffers from prejudice due to devilish appearance.

front.title: •Lady Proxima
front.gametext: Lost if at an exterior site. While with two of your other aliens, adds one battle destiny. During your control phase, may reveal the top three cards of your Reserve Deck, take one alien into hand (if possible), and shuffle your Reserve Deck.
front.lore: Female Grindalid. Gangster. Leader.

front.title: •Lady Valarian
front.gametext: Your total battle destiny here is +1. Unless Jabba on table, 'Jabba' in the game text of your cards (except Hutt Bounty and Jabba's Prize) may be treated as 'Lady Valarian.' Once per turn, may target a Mistryl of ability > 2 here; target gains Heroic until end of turn.
front.lore: Whipids originate from Toola in the Kaelta system, a planet extremely distant from its sun. Accustomed to hunting for prey in the near dark and the bitter cold. Female gangster and leader.

front.title: Lambda-Class Shuttle
front.gametext: Deploy -1 if Sienar Fleet Systems on table. May add 1 pilot and 6 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 1. Takes off and lands for free.
front.lore: Manufactured by Sienar Fleet Systems. Length 20 meters. Bottom wings fold for docking and landing. Boarding ramp allows easy access to passenger and cargo areas.

front.title: •Lana Dobreed
front.gametext: During your move phase, target any or all of your characters at one exterior site to 'transport' (relocate) to another exterior site. Draw destiny. Use that much Force to 'transport,' or place Interrupt in Lost Pile.
front.lore: Dobreed used to have dreams of opening up his own shop in Mos Espa. Now broke from his gambling activities, he provides transportation services to pay for his urges.

front.title: •Lana Dobreed & •Sacrifice
front.gametext: If your character's forfeit was just reduced to 0, use 1 Force (free if forfeit reduced by a [Permanent Weapon] weapon) to restore it to normal. (Immune to Sense.) OR Lose 2 Force to cancel an attempt by Yoda or Obi-Wan to cancel your Interrupt or your just drawn weapon destiny. OR During your move phase, target any or all of your characters at one site to 'transport' (relocate) to an exterior or battleground site. Draw destiny. Use that much Force to 'transport,' or place Interrupt in Lost Pile.

front.title: •Lana Dobreed & •Sacrifice
front.gametext: If your character is about to be hit, use 1 Force (free if by a [Permanent Weapon] weapon) to prevent its forfeit from being reduced for remainder of turn. OR Cancel Disarmed. (Immune to Sense.) OR Cancel a 'react'. OR During your move phase, target any or all of your characters at one site to 'transport' (relocate) to an exterior or battleground site. Draw destiny. Use that much Force to 'transport,' or place Interrupt in Lost Pile.

front.title: •Lando Calrissian
front.gametext: Deploys only on Cloud City. Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. When playing Sabacc, may subtract 1 from or add 1 to your total. If present at a site, can be replaced by opponent with any Light Side Lando.
front.lore: Scoundrel and gambler. Petty administrator of a small Tibanna gas mining operation. Easily coerced. Has problems of his own. Had dealings with the Tonnika sisters - twice.

front.title: •Lando Calrissian (V)
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  Once per turn, while present at a battleground site, may use 1 Force to add or subtract 1 from a just drawn weapon or battle destiny (or from opponent's just drawn destiny).
front.lore: Scoundrel and gambler. Petty administrator of a small Tibanna gas mining operation. Easily coerced. Has problems of his own. Had dealings with the Tonnika sisters - twice.

front.title: Lando System?
front.gametext: During your control phase, use 1 Force to move any one of your [Dagobah] icon characters of ability > 1 to any [Cloud City] icon location where you have presence. If moving to a Cloud City site, this movement is free and you do not need presence.
front.lore: 'Lando's not a system, he's a man.' Regardless of where Rebels flee, dark agents are sure to follow.

front.title: Lando System? (V)
front.gametext: Take Lando or a card with 'Lando' in game text into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR Cancel an attempt to replace your Lando; opponent's Lando is lost.
front.lore: 'Lando's not a system, he's a man.' Regardless of where Rebels flee, dark agents are sure to follow.

front.title: Laser Cannon Battery
front.gametext: Deploy on your capital starship. May deploy as a 'react'. May target a starship using X Force, where X = 0 to 3. Draw destiny. Subtract 2 if targeting a starship with maneuver. If destiny +X > defense value, target hit and opponent loses 1 Force.
front.lore: Trade Federation battleships use concealed quad laser emplacements. Though their coverage is limited, the surprise factor and ferocious firing rate is often overwhelming.

front.title: ••Laser Gate
front.gametext: Deploy between any two interior mobile sites. To pass, a character must have (power + ability) > 4 or use a Lift Tube (all other vehicles are blocked). Laser Gate defense value = 3; may be targeted (as if a character) by a character weapon from either site.
front.lore: Security corridors are guarded by a grid of laser emplacements which can be activated upon demand to seal off sensitive areas from intrusion.

pulledBy: There Is No Try & Oppressive Enforcement (V)

front.title: ••Laser Gate (V)
front.gametext: Deploy between two non-exterior Death Star sites. Unless aboard a Lift Tube, for opponent's character to pass opponent must first lose 1 Force. At adjacent sites: weapon destiny draws are -1, your Force generation may not be limited, and opponent's characters are deploy +2.
front.lore: Security corridors are guarded by a grid of laser emplacements which can be activated upon demand to seal off sensitive areas from intrusion.

front.title: Laser Projector
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on an interior site. May target a seeker (use defense value = 1), character or creature for free. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny -1 > defense value. Laser Projector may be targeted by any weapon (use defense value = 1).
front.lore: Laser system activated by distress signal from guards. Used at security checkpoints and detention block control rooms. Targeting guided by centralized droid controller.

front.title: •Lateral Damage
front.gametext: Deploy on any system. Target an opponent's starship. Target's power and forfeit = 0. When target reaches Utinni Effect, target draws one destiny. Utinni Effect canceled if destiny > 2. Otherwise, draw again next move phase, etc.
front.lore: Starships can become damaged in combat and rendered ineffective until they can be repaired and re-outfitted.

combo: Lateral Damage + I've lost Artoo! (NateA)
Lateral Damage + unique TIE/ln with matching pilot + Tallon Roll (Emmelc)
Lateral Damage + Counter Assault (Indiana Jones Jedi Knight)

front.title: •Lathe
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. If opponent has 2 or more aliens of the same title at this site, may place Lathe in Lost Pile to cause all of them to be lost. Once per turn, may use 1 Force to shuffle opponent's Reserve Deck.
front.lore: Was one of Jabba's vile Nikto henchmen. Leaving Tatooine to see what the galaxy has to offer. Deep down, he loathes the slave trade. Information broker.

front.title: •Leave Them To Me
front.gametext: Deploy on table. While you occupy a 'Subjugated' planet location, operatives are forfeit = 0, operatives do not add to Force drains and your Force drains may not be reduced. At any time, you may place Effect out of play to retrieve 1 Force.
front.lore: 'I will deal with them myself.'

pulledBy: You Cannot Hide Forever & Mobilization Points
cards.counterpart: Let's Keep A Little Optimism Here

front.title: •Leave Them To Me
front.gametext: Plays on table. While you occupy a Subjugated planet location, operatives are forfeit = 0, operatives do not add to Force drains, and your Force drains may not be reduced. (Subjugated planet is defined on the Objective card Local Uprising.)
front.lore: 'I will deal with them myself.'

cards.counterpart: Let's Keep A Little Optimism Here - Defensive Shield

front.title: •Leave Them To Me (Death Star II) (V)
front.gametext: Plays on table. At opponent's Dantooine and Subjugated Planet sites, your Imperials are deploy -2 and your Force drains may not be modified or canceled by opponent. Your game text at opponent's <>Swamp and <>Jungle is canceled. Your characters present at opponent's <>Forest are immune to attrition.
front.lore: 'I will deal with them myself.'

front.title: •Leave Them To Me (V)
front.gametext: Plays on table. At opponent's Dantooine and Subjugated Planet sites, your Imperials are deploy -2 and your Force drains may not be modified or canceled by opponent. Your game text at opponent's <>Swamp and <>Jungle is canceled. Your characters present at opponent's <>Forest are immune to attrition.
front.lore: 'I will deal with them myself.'

front.title: Leia Seeker
front.gametext: Deploys for 1 Force to an unoccupied site. Deploys and moves like an undercover spy. When present with Leia (or warrior) of ability < 3, choose one to be immediately lost (treat as an 'all cards' situation). Seeker is also lost.
front.lore: Military version of a 'remote.' Programmed to stalk specific targets or secondary targets. Heat and light sensors track with fatal accuracy. Can stow away on starships.

combo: Leia Seekers + Dark Side Spies + Nevar Yalnal Total Dark Side site defense.

front.title: Leia Seeker (V)
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy to an unoccupied site. Deploys and moves like an Undercover spy. If present with [Permanent Weapon] Leia or a senator, this weapon and that character are lost ('all cards' situation).
front.lore: Military version of a 'remote'. Programmed to stalk specific targets or secondary targets. Heat and light sensors track with fatal accuracy. Can stow away on starships.

front.title: Let Them Make The First Move / At Last We Will Have Revenge
front.gametext: Let Them Make The First Move:Deploy Theed Palace Generator Core, Theed Palace Generator, and Deep Hatred.{While} this side up, opponent may not Force drain where opponent has a Jedi, and your Force drains at Naboo sites where you have a Dark Jedi may not be canceled. Once during your control phase, may target one opponent's character present with your Dark Jedi at an interior Theed Palace site. Target is lost.{Flip} this card if an opponent's Jedi present at an interior Naboo battleground site.At Last We Will Have Revenge:{While} this side up, you may not Force drain or initiate battle at any location where you have a Dark Jedi. Once during your move phase, your Dark Jedi may initiate lightsaber combat against an opponent's Jedi present: Each player draws 2 destiny. Loser (lowest total) loses 2 Force (cannot be reduced). If difference is 5 or greater, lost Force must come from Reserve Deck, and losing character is lost.{Flip} this card and retrieve 1 Force if opponent has no Jedi present at any interior Naboo battleground.

back.title: Let Them Make The First Move / At Last We Will Have Revenge
back.gametext: Let Them Make The First Move:Deploy Theed Palace Generator Core, Theed Palace Generator, and Deep Hatred.{While} this side up, opponent may not Force drain where opponent has a Jedi, and your Force drains at Naboo sites where you have a Dark Jedi may not be canceled. Once during your control phase, may target one opponent's character present with your Dark Jedi at an interior Theed Palace site. Target is lost.{Flip} this card if an opponent's Jedi present at an interior Naboo battleground site.At Last We Will Have Revenge:{While} this side up, you may not Force drain or initiate battle at any location where you have a Dark Jedi. Once during your move phase, your Dark Jedi may initiate lightsaber combat against an opponent's Jedi present: Each player draws 2 destiny. Loser (lowest total) loses 2 Force (cannot be reduced). If difference is 5 or greater, lost Force must come from Reserve Deck, and losing character is lost.{Flip} this card and retrieve 1 Force if opponent has no Jedi present at any interior Naboo battleground.

front.title: Let's Pass On That
front.gametext: During opponent's control phase, your ferocious creature attacks. At end of turn, if that creature is at an unoccupied site and did not move, opponent loses 1 Force and you retrieve 1 Force. OR Use 3 Force to retrieve a creature.
front.lore: 'Uu a'kingsa riika pagh bagla bis kachata weenow con bantha poodoo.'

front.title: •Levitation Attack
front.gametext: If a battle was just initiated where you have a character of ability > 3 present, search your Used Pile for one device which deploys on a character. Add device's destiny number to your total power, then place device on top of Used Pile.
front.lore: Vader used his mastery of the Force to levitate objects from around the room. This calculated attack was designed to break Luke's spirit as well as his body.

front.title: •Levitation Attack (V)
front.gametext: Deploy (or retrieve) a device (for free) from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Sense.)  OR  Cancel Sabotage targeting a device.  OR  During a battle, place your weapon or device present in Used Pile to add 2 to your total power (3 if Vader present).
front.lore: Vader used his mastery of the Force to levitate objects from around the room. This calculated attack was designed to break Luke's spirit as well as his body.

front.title: •Lieutenant Arnet
front.gametext: Deploys free aboard Blizzard Scout 1. Adds 2 to power of any combat vehicle he pilots (or 3 if an AT-ST). When piloting Tempest Scout 1, draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise. Opponent may not 'react' to or from same site.
front.lore: Veteran AT-ST pilot assigned to coordinate the surprise counterattack in the Battle of Endor. Commanded a prototype AT-ST in General Veers' assault upon Hoth.

cancels: A 'react' to or from same site

front.title: •Lieutenant Cabbel
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of any starship he pilots. On Tyrant, also adds one to Armor. When in battle with an Imperial leader, subtracts 1 from opponent's total battle destiny.
front.lore: A recent graduate of the Officer's Candidate School on Carida. Serves as first officer of the Tyrant. Ambitious, ruthless and efficient.

front.title: •Lieutenant Cecius
front.gametext: Deploys free to any Executor site. Power +3 when participating in a Besieged battle. During your control phase, may use 1 Force to search your Reserve Deck, take one Besieged or Set For Stun into hand and reshuffle.
front.lore: Former member of the Imperial infantry. Specializes in boarding and taking control of enemy ships. Native of Vogel 7. Hasn't had a date in years.

front.title: •Lieutenant Cecius (V)
front.gametext: Opponent's characters are deploy +1 to same mobile site. At battlegrounds where you have a unique (•) and non-unique Imperial present (and no other bonus to your Force drain), your Force drains are +1. Tactical Support is a Used Interrupt.
front.lore: Former member of the Imperial infantry. Specializes in boarding and taking control of enemy ships. Native of Vogel 7. Hasn't had a date in years.

front.title: •Lieutenant Commander Ardan
front.gametext: If at a site, draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise. Immune to attrition < X, where X = the number of opponent's aliens present.
front.lore: Commander of Executor bridge pit crews. Native of Brentaal. Participated in the subjugation of Ithor, Kashyyyk, Firro, Sinton and other planets populated by non-humans.

front.title: •Lieutenant Dopheld Mitaka
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. When drawn for destiny, use 1 Force or this card is lost. During your deploy phase, may use 3 Force to relocate Kylo from here to same site as a Resistance character.
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: •Lieutenant Endicott
front.gametext: Deploys -2 to any docking bay or launch bay. While he is at Death Star II: Docking Bay, you may shuttle for free between here and exterior sites related to system Death Star II orbits.
front.lore: Docking bay technician. Orphan. Offered post on new Death Star when he graduated third in class from the Imperial Academy at Carida.

front.title: •Lieutenant Grond
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots or any swoop he drives. When in battle at an exterior site, adds 2 to attrition against opponent for each of your biker scout/trooper (non-biker scout) pairs present.
front.lore: Colonel Dyer's aide. Coordinates scout actions. As a youth, raced swoops on homeworld of Corellia. Formerly served with Emperor's Demonstration Team.

combo: Lieutenant Grond + Commander Igar + Scout Recon

front.title: •Lieutenant Grond (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Adds one battle destiny if with Colonel Dyer or if driving a swoop. May place Lieutenant Grond in Used Pile to cancel a Force drain at a related location.
front.lore: Colonel Dyer's aide. Coordinates scout actions. As a youth, raced swoops on homeworld of Corellia. Formerly served with Emperor's Demonstration Team.

front.title: •Lieutenant Hebsly
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. When piloting Scythe 3, once per turn may subtract 1 from maneuver of one opponent's starfighter at same location for remainder of turn.
front.lore: Served in Anoat sector. Uses excellent maneuverability of TIE/ln to his advantage in combat.

front.title: •Lieutenant Renz
front.gametext: Power +2 while present with a stormtrooper. You Rebel Scum target a Rebel at same site is a Used Interrupt and is immune to Sense. Immune to attrition < number of stormtroopers present.
front.lore: Leader of one of the Emperor's finest legions of troops. His command was placed at the disposal of Colonel Dyer. Always on the lookout for Rebel activity.

combo: Lieutenant Renz + You Rebel Scum

front.title: •Lieutenant Renz (V)
front.gametext: Once per game, if at a battleground site, may initiate a Force drain that cannot be canceled; Force drain is +X (this bonus may not be canceled; ignore other modifiers) where X = the number of unique (•) Stormtroopers at battleground sites.
front.lore: Leader of one of the Emperor's finest legions of troops. His command was placed at the disposal of Colonel Dyer. Always on the lookout for Rebel activity.

front.title: •Lieutenant Sheckil
front.gametext: During your control phase, may use 1 Force to search your Reserve Deck, take one Human Shield into hand and reshuffle. When escorting a captive, captive is forfeit +2 and Sheckil is immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Former warrant officer from Concord Dawn. Promoted due to superb performance. Specializes in transporting high-profile criminals. Twin brother of a famous mercenary.

combo: Lieutenant Sheckil + Human Shield + Binders

front.title: •Lieutenant Suba
front.gametext: While at a Death Star or Executor site, your troopers deploy free there and are power and forfeit +1 there, and you may use 1 Force to search your Reserve Deck and take one Tactical Support into hand. Shuffle, cut and replace.
front.lore: Chief of security and political officer on Executor. Responsible for ensuring the loyalty of his fellow officers. Disapproved of Vader's unwillingness to simply kill Skywalker.

front.title: •Lieutenant Tanbris
front.gametext: Deploy -1 for starship weapons of any starship he pilots. Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Subtracts 1 from maneuver of any starfighter he pilots.
front.lore: Former fighter pilot grounded after injury. Tactical officer aboard Death Star. Competent strategist. Specializes in directing Imperial starfighters.

front.title: •Lieutenant Venka
front.gametext: Power +2 when at an Executor site or same site as Tarkin or Chief Bast, or if the Death Star has been 'blown away.' Fear Will Keep Them In Line is destiny +2 and, when it adds 1 to your power, also adds 1 to attrition against opponent.
front.lore: Worked hard for a transfer to the Executor. One of the many noncommissioned personnel promoted to replace the vast number of officers lost during the Death Star disaster.

combo: Lieutnant Venka + Tarkin + Chief Bast

front.title: •Lieutenant Venka (V)
front.gametext: Deploys -1 to Executor. While aboard a capital starship, adds 1 to armor and its defense value may not be reduced. While Fear Will Keep Them In Line here, when you win a battle at a related site where you have an Imperial, opponent loses 2 Force.
front.lore: Worked hard for a transfer to the Executor. One of the many noncommissioned personnel promoted to replace the vast number of officers lost during the Death Star disaster.

front.title: •Lieutenant Watts
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of any combat vehicle he pilots. Adds 1 to each weapon destiny draw of any combat vehicle he pilots (or 2 if on Tempest Scout 2 or if present with Marquand).
front.lore: Native of Corulag. Watts' gunnery skills produce devastating results. Temporarily assigned to Kuat Drive Yards to work on prototype AT-ST weaponry.

combo: Lieutenant Watts + Tempest Scout 2 + Major Marquand

front.title: •Lieutenant Watts (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Once per turn, if at a battleground site, may take a weapon from Lost Pile into hand to cancel a Force drain at a related site.
front.lore: Native of Corulag. Watts' gunnery skills produce devastating results. Temporarily assigned to Kuat Drive Yards to work on prototype AT-ST weaponry.

front.title: Lift Tube
front.gametext: May carry 4 passengers. Deploy and move only at interior mobile sites. May move without presence aboard. Also, may move as a 'react' only to a battle or Force drain (if within range).
front.lore: System of enclosed high-speed vertical and horizontal transport cylinders. Used in space stations, large starships, Death Stars, etc.

front.title: Light Repeating Blaster Rifle
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on your warrior. If your power droid or fusion generator present, may target a character, creature or vehicle using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +1 > defense value. May fire repeatedly for 2 Force each time.
front.lore: BlasTech model T-21 light repeating blaster. Excellent power, good range. Carries energy for 25 shots. Unlimited firepower when attached to a power generator.

canceledBy: Game text canceled by Mandalorian Mishap

front.title: Lightsaber Deficiency
front.gametext: Cancel Lightsaber Proficiency. OR Target a character with ability < 4 using a lightsaber in a battle or a Force drain. Draw destiny. Target lost if destiny > ability. Lightsaber lost if destiny = ability.

front.title: Lightsaber Deficiency (V)
front.gametext: Take Ghhhk or Molator into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR Cancel Corellian Retort, Gift Of The Mentor, or Jedi Presence. OR Retrieve Protocol Failure into hand. OR If a lightsaber was just 'swung' during battle, it may not target again this battle.

front.title: •Lightsaber Parry
front.gametext: USED: If a battle was just initiated where you have a character armed with a lightsaber, characters may not be targeted by lightsabers for remainder of battle.  LOST: If opponent just initiated a duel, opponent must choose to lose 4 Force or cancel the duel.
front.lore: Vader had to show Luke that giving in to the dark side of the Force was his only destiny.

front.title: •Limited Resources
front.gametext: If the opponent has two cards or less in hand, opponent must immediately lose 2 Force (4 Force if it is your turn). If the opponent has Fusion Generator Supply Tanks aboard a starship, loss is reduced by 2.
front.lore: The Empire dominates consumption of resources. Despite being efficient, Rebel logistical and maintenance officers often are compelled to expend emergency reserves.

combo: Limited Resources + Defensive Fire

front.title: LIN-V8M (Elleyein-Veeateemm)
front.gametext: At any time during your turn, may use 1 Force to 'defuse' (lose) any one mine at same site.
front.lore: Armored military droid which specializes in laying explosive mines. Originally intended to set charges inside ore and spice mines, but has also been converted for military use.

combo: LIN-V8M (Elleyein-Veeateemm) + Infantry Mine

front.title: •Lirin Car'n
front.gametext: For each other musician present, adds a 'cover charge' of 1 to the Force required to move or deploy each character to same site.
front.lore: Bith mercenary. Male back-up to Kloo Horn player in Figrin D'an's band. Only musician, besides Doikk, who has not lost ownership of his instrument to Figrin.

front.title: •Little Real Power
front.gametext: During any control phase, target an opponent's character with politics present with your senator at Galactic Senate. For remainder of turn, target's game text is canceled and target is politics = 0.
front.lore: 'He is mired by baseless accusations of corruption.'

cancels: Game text of a senator at Galactic Senate

front.title: •Lobel
front.gametext: Subtracts 2 from forfeit of each opponent's pilot at same site. Prevents characters from moving to or from same or adjacent site using Elis Helrot or Nabrun Leids.
front.lore: Powerful magnetic fields in the Lobel physiology make the operation of nearby navigation devices impossible. Pilots claim these fields also produce headaches.

front.title: •Lobot
front.gametext: Deploys only on Cloud City. Power +2 when present at a Scomp Link. If present at a site, can be replaced by opponent with any Light Side Lobot. While present on Cloud City with your Lando, prevents replacement of Lobot and Lando.
front.lore: Son of a traveling slaver. Helps run Cloud City with Administrator Lando Calrissian. Speech capability worn away by constant cyborg neural connection.

front.title: Local Trouble
front.gametext: Use 1 Force at the beginning of your battle phase to allow any two of your Stormtroopers in the Cantina to battle any one opponent's character (your choice). You may add one battle destiny. No other battles may occur in Cantina this turn.
front.lore: 'Look like somebody's beginning to take an interest in your handiwork.' Imperial stormtroopers coerce local residents to assist them in the apprehension of Rebel scum.

front.title: Local Trouble (V)
front.gametext: At the beginning of your battle phase, use 1 Force to initate a battle between two Imperials and an opponent's character present at same interior site. For remainder of turn, no other battles may occur here and opponent takes no battle damage here.
front.lore: 'Look like somebody's beginning to take an interest in your handiwork.' Imperial stormtroopers coerce local residents to assist them in the apprehension of Rebel scum.

front.title: •Location, Location, Location
front.gametext: Deploy on table. At the end of each player's deploy phase, if they did not deploy a location, they lose 1 Force. Effect canceled if any player deploys three or more locations in a single turn.
front.lore: 'Mudhole? Slimy? My home this is!'

front.title: •Location, Location, Location (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Your locations are destiny +1. During their deploy phase, players may use 2 Force to deploy a battleground planet site (except a War Room) not on table from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: 'Mudhole? Slimy? My home this is!'

front.title: •Lone Pilot
front.gametext: If your pilot (or permanent pilot) is defending a battle alone at a system or sector, add one battle destiny. OR If Motti is defending a battle alone at a system or sector, add two battle destiny.
front.lore: One lone TIE fighter, acting as a scout near the Death Star, suddenly encountered the Millennium Falcon.

front.title: •Lone Pilot (V)
front.gametext: USED: Activate 1 Force.  STARTING: Take into hand from Reserve Deck Bossk, Dengar, DS-61-2, Guri or Juno Eclipse (may also take into hand from Reserve Deck a matching starship, a system with exactly 1 [Dark Side Force], and an always [Immune to Alter] Effect). When drawing your starting hand, draw four cards instead of eight. Place this Interrupt in Lost Pile.
front.lore: One lone TIE fighter, acting as a scout near the Death Star, suddenly encountered the Millennium Falcon.

front.title: •Lone Warrior
front.gametext: If any warrior is defending a battle alone at a site, add one battle destiny. OR If Tagge is defending a battle alone at a site, add two battle destiny.
front.lore: Though generally deployed in squads, all Imperial warriors are trained in the close combat techniques and have a reputation for ferocity when cornered.

front.title: Look Sir, Droids
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to search through the opponent's Used Pile and move any droids you find there to opponent's Lost Pile. OR Use X Force to destroy any one droid on table where X = droid's deploy cost.
front.lore: Trooper 1124, Davin Felth, discovered droid plating dropped by R2- D2 and C-3PO when exiting escape pod.

front.title: Look Sir, Droids (V)
front.gametext: USED: Take into hand from Reserve Deck a non-[Droid with Presence], non-[Permanent Weapon] droid. OR Place a card from hand on Used Pile.  STARTING: Deploy from Reserve Deck two Effects which are always immune to Alter. If you have only one location (with < 3 [Dark Side Force]) on table, may deploy from Reserve Deck Central Office or Mos Eisley. Place this interrupt in hand.
front.lore: Trooper 1124, Davin Felth, discovered droid plating dropped by R2- D2 and C-3PO when exiting escape pod.

front.title: •Lord Maul
front.gametext: Deploys -2 to Naboo. While with Qui-Gon, your battle destinies here are each +1. When Maul wins a lightsaber combat, adds 2 to opponent's Force loss. Immune to Clash Of Sabers and attrition < 5 (or < 6 if armed with a lightsaber).  May not be Disarmed.
front.lore: Sent by Darth Sidious to Naboo in order to assist the Trade Federation in their blockade there. His confrontation with Obi-Wan and Qui-Gon would impact history forever.

combo: Lord Maul + Maul Strikes
Lord Maul + The Phantom Menace While present with an opponent's Jedi, Maul is defense value +2 and immune to attrition.
Lord Maul + I Have You Now Add one battle destiny (two if Rebel is Luke) if a Dark Jedi and a Rebel with ability > 2 are involved in the same battle.
Lord Maul + Force Field Cancels an attempt to target a Dark Jedi with a character weapon.

front.title: •Lord Maul With Lightsaber
front.gametext: Permanent weapon is •Maul's Lightsaber (may add 1 to Force drain where present; adds 1 to your battle destiny draws here; may target a character for free; draw two destiny; target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value).
front.lore: Trade Federation.

front.title: •Lord Sidious
front.gametext: Whenever a Jedi is forfeited and you have exactly two Dark Jedi on table, retrieve 2 Force. While at your Senate and you have no Senators here, Sidious is politics +4 and his game text may not be canceled. Immune to [Virtual Block 1] Leia and attrition.
front.lore: Leader. Trade Federation.

front.title: •Lord Sidious
front.gametext: Once per game, may take Always Two There Are or a Neimoidian into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. If alone (or a [Theed Palace] objective on table) and opponent just initiated battle here, may exclude one character of ability < 6 present. Immune to attrition.
front.lore: Leader. Trade Federation.

front.title: •Lord Vader
front.gametext: Deploys -2 to Executor, Death Star II or Endor. Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. While armed with a lightsaber, adds 2 to his defense value and 1 to each of his lightsaber weapon destiny draws. Immune to Uncontrollable Fury and attrition < 6.
front.lore: Forgiving administrator of Imperial policy. Emperor Palpatine's most trusted leader. Believes converting Skywalker is key to the Alliance's downfall.

combo: Lord Vader + I Have You Now Add one battle destiny (two if Rebel is Luke) if a Dark Jedi and a Rebel with ability > 2 are involved in the same battle.
Lord Vader + Force Field Cancels an attempt to target a Dark Jedi with a character weapon.
Lord Vader + any lightsaber + The Circle Is Now Complete No destiny draw, bye-bye any power 6 Obi Wan (Team Stephenville favorite) (Lord Helmet)

front.title: •Lord Vader (V)
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  May deploy an opponent's lightsaber just lost from same site on him (for free); may then use two weapons.  While The Quick And Easy Path on table, Jedi Escape and What Was It? may not cancel duels.  Immune to attrition < 5.
front.lore: Forgiving administrator of Imperial policy. Emperor Palpatine's most trusted leader. Believes converting Skywalker is key to the Alliance's downfall.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Jerry Jensen - PC Volunteer Award 2005)

front.title: Lost In Space
front.gametext: If a pilot was just lost from a system or sector, deploy on that location and stack pilot here. Pilot may be rescued or captured by any capital starship present here during any move phase, and may be targeted by weapons (except during battle) as if present (treat as a starfighter with defense value = 0). Lost if no pilot here.
front.lore: Congratulations on purchasing the TIE/ln starfighter by Sienar. Equipped with a jettison device and distress beacon, it should provide you with years of worry-free subjugation.

front.title: •Lott Dod
front.gametext: Agendas: ambition, blockade, trade. While in a senate majority, once during your control phase, may search your Force Pile and take any one card there into hand; reshuffle. While at Galactic Senate, your other Neimoidians are forfeit +2.
front.lore: Primary Neimoidian senator who represents the Trade Federation in the Galactic Senate. Thwarted attempts by Amidala to end the blockade of Naboo.

combo: Lott Dod + Our Blockade Is Perfectly Legal
Lott Dod + This Is Outrageous!
Lott Dod + I Will Make It Legal! + senate majority

front.title: •Lt. Pol Treidum
front.gametext: While at Docking Control Room 327, adds 2 to your total power at Docking Bay 327. Once during each of your control phases, if at same site as an Undercover spy, may draw destiny. Spy's 'cover is broken' if destiny = spy's ability.
front.lore: Gantry officer charged with maintaining magnetic field, atmosphere and security in Death Star docking bay. After mission on Ralltiir, paranoid about infiltration by Rebel spies.

front.title: •Lt. Pol Treidum (V)
front.gametext: Adds 1 to power of anything he pilots. When deployed (or leaves table), may draw top card of Reserve Deck or Used Pile. During battle, attrition against you is -1 for each ISB agent here (limit -3). Your spies here (unless Undercover) are immune to Double Agent.
front.lore: Gantry officer charged with maintaining magnetic field, atmosphere and security in Death Star docking bay. After mission on Ralltiir, paranoid about infiltration by Rebel spies.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Ryan Jellison and Blake Huffman)

front.title: •Lt. Poldin Lehuse
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. During battle, if piloting a [First Order] TIE, may target an opponent's capital starship at same system. Draw destiny. If destiny > 2, choose one pilot character aboard target to be forfeit = 0 for remainder of battle.
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: •Lt. Shann Childsen
front.gametext: Power +2 when at Detention Block Corridor or Detention Block Control Room. Also, power +2 when an opponent's alien is present (+3 if alien is a Wookiee, Talz or Ewok).
front.lore: Demoted after a superior blamed him for a clerical error. Considered a bully by fellow officers. Fanatically supports the New Order doctrine of alien subjugation.

front.title: Luke Seeker
front.gametext: Deploys for 1 Force to an unoccupied site. Deploys and moves like an undercover spy. When present with Luke of ability < 4 or pilot of ability < 3, choose one to be immediately lost (treat as an 'all cards' situation). Seeker is also lost.
front.lore: Military version of a 'remote.' Programmed to stalk specific targets or secondary targets. Heat and light sensors track with fatal accuracy. Can stow away on starships.

front.title: •Luke Skywalker, The Emperor's Prize/Luke Skywalker, The Emperor's Prize
front.gametext: This is a Dark Side card and does not count toward your deck limit. Reveal to opponent when deploying your Starting Effect. Deploys to Death Star II: Throne Room only at start of game as a frozen captive if Bring Him Before Me on table and Your Destiny is suspended; otherwise place out of play. For remainder of game, may not be placed in Reserve Deck. This is a persona of Luke only while on table. While this side up, Bring Him Before Me may not flip. May not be escorted. Flip this card if Vader present and not escorting a captive. Place out of play if released or about to leave table.

back.title: •Luke Skywalker, The Emperor's Prize/Luke Skywalker, The Emperor's Prize
back.gametext: This is a Dark Side card and does not count toward your deck limit. Reveal to opponent when deploying your Starting Effect. Deploys to Death Star II: Throne Room only at start of game as a frozen captive if Bring Him Before Me on table and Your Destiny is suspended; otherwise place out of play. For remainder of game, may not be placed in Reserve Deck. This is a persona of Luke only while on table. While this side up, Bring Him Before Me may not flip. May not be escorted. Flip this card if Vader present and not escorting a captive. Place out of play if released or about to leave table.

front.title: •Luke? Luuuuke!
front.gametext: Deploy on any Tatooine site. Target any Rebel. Target is power and forfeit -1 (-3 if target is Luke). If Rebel's forfeit reaches zero, Rebel is lost. Utinni Effect canceled when reached by target.
front.lore: 'All right. I'll be right there, Aunt Beru.'

combo: Luke? Luuuuke! + any lightsaber or weapon that causes forfeit = 0 (Ryan French [Shadow 13])
Luke? Luuuuke! + Bossk/Zuckuss against Chewbacca; + Dengar against Rebel Han (Indiana Jones Jedi Knight)

front.title: •Luke? Luuuuke! (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on your non-droid character present at a battleground site; character may not be carried from here or move. Target a Jedi at a site. You lose no more than 1 Force to Force drains at target's location. This Utinni Effect canceled when reached by target.
front.lore: 'All right. I'll be right there, Aunt Beru.'

front.title: •Luuke
front.gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. May use any stolen lightsaber. During battle, may steal a lightsaber from opponent's Lost Pile (return weapon to opponent's Lost Pile if it is about to leave table or at end of battle). May use 2 Force to cancel Luke's game text here for remainder of turn.
front.lore: Assassin and Clone.

front.title: •Lyn Me
front.gametext: Subtracts 1 from deploy cost of Bounty hunters at same site (Boba Fett deploy free). During battle, subtracts X from opponent's total power, where X = number of your musicians present (+2 if battling Luke or Han, or +4 if both).
front.lore: Twi'lek musician whose village hired Boba Fett for protection from slavers. Fell in love with the famous mercenary. Vowed to kill Luke and Han.

front.title: •Maarek Stele, The Emperor's Reach
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  Once per game, may take a TIE Defender into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  While piloting, opponent may not cancel or substitute battle destiny draws here.  While piloting an Imperial starfighter, it is maneuver +2 and he draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise.
front.lore: Leader.

front.title: •Maarek Stele, The Emperor's Reach
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  Once per game, may take a TIE Defender into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  While piloting, opponent may not cancel or substitute battle destiny draws here.  While piloting an Imperial starfighter, it is maneuver +2 and he draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise.
front.lore: Leader.

front.title: Macroscan
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy near opponent's Reserve Deck. At any time, you may use 1 Force to peek at the top card of that deck. If 'nighttime conditions' exist anywhere on table, you may peek at the top three cards.
front.lore: Electrobinocular view. Readouts list object's true and relative azimuth, elevation and range. Built-in night vision.

front.title: Macroscan (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on a site. Once per game, you may re-circulate. Once per turn, may cancel and redraw your destiny to power (or a Dark Hours destiny) here, or use X Force to reveal top X cards of your Reserve Deck; may place one in Used Pile (replace other cards in same order).
front.lore: Electrobinocular view. Readouts list object's true and relative azimuth, elevation and range. Built-in night vision.

front.title: Magnetic Suction Tube
front.gametext: Deploy on your Sandcrawler. Once during each of your control phases, may target one character present. Draw destiny. If destiny > character's ability, 'suck up' character (relocate to related interior Sandcrawler site or owner's Used Pile).
front.lore: 'Slurp.'

front.title: •Main Course
front.gametext: USED: Cancel Frozen Assets. (Immune to Sense.)  LOST: If opponent's alien and Rebel are in battle together without a protocol droid, draw one destiny (or two if Rebel is Han) and subtract that amount from opponent's attrition and total power.
front.lore: Threepio always tried to be polite to Captain Solo and to keep him from getting hot under the collar.

front.title: •Major Hewex
front.gametext: Adds 1 to total power for each of your troopers present at same site. When on Endor, subtracts 1 from total for Deactivate The Shield Generator and your troopers are forfeit +1 on Endor. When at Bunker, allows Imperials to deploy there as a 'react'.
front.lore: Leader of Navy detachment assigned to guard the Endor control bunker. Liaison between Imperial technicians and command staff.

front.title: •Major Hewex (V)
front.gametext: Your unique (•) Stormtroopers are deploy -1 to same site and are forfeit +1 at same and related locations.
